name: Verho
description: Verho is a Dungeon Crawler Dark RPG game that is inspired by games like "King's Field" and "Lunacid".

name: Echoes of a Turnabout: Franziska von Karma
description: When a heavy snowstorm shuts down the city, the Wright Anything Agency asks a friend already at the scene of the crime to investigate...

name: Crimson Thread of Fate
description: It's almost time for your reincarnation! With the help of Moira, enter the path of reincarnation and meet certain someone there. Hey, maybe he will be your soulmate in your next life. Who knows? You decide!

name: Momotarou
description: Trapped in a winterscape, Momotarou converses with a demon and learns more about himself.

name: Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney 4
description: Set in the year 2029, it continues to follow the career of Apollo Justice, who is forced to find a new underage magician assistant after every other character from AJ1 leaves for Hawaii. He soon becomes acquainted with a brand new cast of characters, and, of course, becomes involved in a number of unusual murders and cases.

name: Where is Mrs Peregrine?
description: A precious family member is missing! She's old, and the weather is pretty cold... Let's search for her!

name: Snow Storm
description: Snow Storm is a flash game where you clear the snow at a parking lot. Clearing many of the snow will cause an icon of hot chocolate to appear and will take you to the next level.

name: Turnabout Steampunk
description: It is an Ace Attorney RPG in a steampunk world of magic power and steam machines, by SophiaSW and RabbitonBooks.Trucy Wright, lived with her baker farther in Phoenix Town, the most remote little town in the Fey Kingdom. One day, Detective Ema visited the Wright Bakery during her investigation to a neighboring country...and Trucy decided to travel along as her assistant. A lost treasure, murder cases, airships, cities faraway...in this vast and exciting world, what lies in the end of their journey?

name: We Grew Up in War
description: Discover the stories of kids growing up in the midst of armed conflicts over the last three decades. Inspired by real testimonies, this narrative adventure follows the lives of children from Bosnia, Syria, and Ukraine.

name: Test Subject
description: Test Subject is a short visual novel created for O2A2 Game Jam 2024 with strict asset limitations, where you become a necromancer's test subject?

name: Triangle Strategy
description: TRIANGLE STRATEGY on Meta Quest offers a complex, tactical battle system enhanced by intuitive VR controls that make for an immersive hands-on RPG experience. Utilize 360-degree 3D movement on the battlefield and place characters yourself to fine-tune combat strategy – with the characters’ fates literally in your hands, players can experience the dramatic story of clashing kingdoms like never before. The title also supports Meta Quest’s Passthrough feature on Meta Quest 3 and Meta Quest 3S, meshing the game’s environment with real-world surroundings to create next-level immersion.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Coat of Many Feathers
description:
To settle a decades-long war for territorial sovereignty, Lord Trieu Da of the Qin and King An Duong Vuong of Au Lac agreed to a political marriage between their firstborn children. In anticipation for the wedding, Lord Trieu Da sent his son, Trong Thuy, to remain at Au Lac's Royal Citadel as a show of the Qin's goodwill.

On the other end, Princess My Chau is ecstatic at getting an opportunity to meet someone from beyond the citadel walls. Will you be able to aid her attempts to befriend the kindly yet distant Trong Thuy? Or will you let their relationship fall apart before it could even begin?

name: One Life: Parkour Project
description: Are you looking for a REAL parkour game but haven't found anything? One Life - Parkour Project is the one for you! Relax, headphones up, customize your character and do parkour... EVERYWHERE!

name: Terraformers: Megastructures
description: In this Terraformers' DLC you can build a megastructure in every Martian city. Will you construct a self-sufficient Arcology, a facility to completely control a city's local climate zone, or a space elevator to vastly increase your trading capacity?

name: Phá Kén: Khúc Điêu Linh
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Word
description: A mysterious earthquake shatters the two protagonists' final day on an alien planet. Help them escape using a Scrabble-like method of communication!

name: Turnabout Divergence
description:
You know that trial where Phoenix lost his badge?
What if you throw in a couple of deus-ex-machinas that cause him to uh, well, not lose said badge.
He's still in a bit of a jam, though. It's not going to be that easy.

name: The Turnabout that Shouldn't Exist
description: If you woke up in a world that no longer needed you, what would you do? What would you make of yourself in a time where you no longer exist...?

name: Turnabout Turnabout
description: A long time ago, in a galaxy far, far away, but also not really because it takes place in our world, except it's not our world because California is Japanese and the court system is different, but also it's very similar to ours except for that, except for the fact that ghosts are real, but they don't know they're ghosts, so it's kinda like the Sixth Sense, except people don't just see dead people out of nowhere, you have to train to be able to see dead people...

name: Make My Life Worse
description: It's the year 2022, in a world where a few people suddenly started developing superpowers during the 20th century. This is highly rare and still not fully understood. Some use their powers for good, some for evil, and some just use it as a tool for daily life or in their careers. Marnie Yao happens to be one of those rare few who has a superpower. But she doesn't really care about any of that. No, what's really important is that she's heartbroken after finding out her favorite VTuber is ending activities, and in that sad state of feeling miserable about it is where our strange tale begins.

name: Universe of Trials
description: Universe of Trials is a multiplayer climbing game with fun modes. Race to the top, dodge hazards in "Floor is Lava," survive in "Falling Floor," or outlast everyone in "Last to Leave." Compete, climb, and conquer the leaderboards!

name: Inside Out at The Top of the World
description: A visual novel about awkward conversations and being stuck next to your boss on a gigantic rollercoaster

name: Courting Death
description: Life at Midsommar University has been rather mundane; you mostly bum around campus and go out drinking with your roommate Lin on the weekends. At the end of an extended bender, you meet a girl who delivers to you something you could have never imagined: you've been cursed to die come Friday.

name: LEGO: City Builder
description: Mayor Fleck is on holiday and you're in charge! Help new city dwellers connect using the all-new Road Plates and bring LEGO City to life!

name: Gears of War
description: This expanded version for Windows added a new story Act, as well as new multiplayer maps.

name: Malleus Maleficarum: The Witch of San Ignacio
description: World similar yet distinct from our own where the witch hunts were even deadlier than in our world's history. The village of San Ignacio welcomes a new day, and with it, yet another witch trial. Another supposed witch is tried by the inquisition, yet these accusations involve strange circumstances that no one seems able to explain.

name: Tales of a Turnabout
description: It's been a few years since the Underground opened up. Humans and monsters have been living, for the most part, relatively peacefully. However, there are still some tensions between the two groups. Namely, the existence of a serial killer who seeks to wipe out the monsters. In these desperate times, one skeleton seeks to become an "Attorney Ace" and defend humans to the best of his ability. Nyeh heh heh!

name: The Six Transgender Lesbian Goddesses of Love Are Having A Petty Argument, So They Try To Settle Things Alongside The Three Transgender Gay Gods of Flavor
description: The title explains it all...

name: Stardust
description: Stardust by James Burton released in 1995 is a brilliant puzzle game based on a few simple rules, but becomes very complex by the end of 50 levels. You start at the entrance portal and must manipulate your surroundings by creating and removing blocks, or "Stardust", in order to get to the exit.

name: The Veiled Ones
description: The Veiled Ones is a horror stealth game about a Muslim exorcist trying to save his son from a jinn possession. In this game players will reveal the story behind their son's possession, while avoiding the jinn that haunts them.

name: Defend Him, Not Me!
description: A comedy Ace Attorney fan case, named after "Kiss Him, Not Me"

name: The Guardian and the Dreamer
description: A simple conversation which can lead to one of 3 different endings.

name: TransMemory
description: I woke up in a dimly lit basement. You have no memory of who you are or why you are here. Can you escape from this place?

name: Ladies and Gentlemen, It's the Turnabout Show!
description:
In a strange world being televised to others as a sitcom, defense attorney Jack Jackson must defend a strange client from a strange murder
accusation. But can he get through it with his sanity intact?

name: Isaac Phens: Ace Attorney
description: The game takes place about the same time as Trials and Tribulations. It follows a new Defense Attorney: Isaac Phens. While he is starting fresh, you shouldn't judge a book by its cover. With an all-new ability (that just so happens to use the Thought Route background), Isaac is ready to prove his clients are innocent!

name: Redd War: Turnabout
description: In a world similar to our own, a race of sociopathic humanoid creatures known simply as the REDD arrived to Earth and unleashed their homicidal tendencies. But over time, a truce was formed between the humans and REDD. A truce that is in effect on all days but one. This day is known to the entire globe as the REDD War.

name: Five Hearts Under One Roof
description: Yuman’s, the player, once solitary home and routine are now invaded by five beautiful women! Each has her unique charm – the 'childhood friend of 20 years,' the 'first love and former idol,' the 'demanding boss,' the 'bold younger girl,' and the 'shy recluse.' Who will you choose?

name: Gaming Cafe Simulator
description: Revive a closed-down gaming café and build it into the ultimate gaming hub! Manage rentals, sell gaming merch, and expand with PCs, consoles, and an in-house café to prepare and sell fresh food. Attract customers with unique gaming sections. Can you turn your dream café into a bustling success?

name: Exploding Kittens VR
description:
Play with up to five players online or against bots and strategically force your opponents to draw the dreaded Exploding Kitten and be the last person standing to win. Customize your own in-game avatars, explore the social hub and dive into a variety of entertaining mini-games.
Interact With Your Favorite Card Game Like Never Before: A VR strategy game experience to socialize with friends and make new enemies.

name: I'm on Observation Duty 7
description: The seventh installment of this beloved franchise presents you with six new levels, unique anomalies and insane intruders. As an employee of a mysterious organization your job is to monitor live surveillance camera footage and spot anomalies. Report any changes in the monitored rooms by clicking on the anomaly and selecting the type OR by choosing the right location and type of the anomaly from a menu to fix it. Anomalies appear at random so you never knows what is going to happen next. Too many active and unreported anomalies means death. Goal is to survive the entire night (from 00:00 to 06:00 in game time). You will need sharp eyes and good memory. The game contains psychological horror that mainly comes from making you paranoid about what has changed.

name: Eletta
description: Explore an unfamiliar place filled with powerful enemies, advanced technology and scientific advancements in Eletta, an action game about a young girl looking for a way back home.

name: Nubs!
description: Slap yourself into the absurdity of Nubs, where 5-player battles are as chaotic as they are quick! Risk it all for the mighty Konzumos' delight in this arena brawler and smash the others to nublivion in your quest for glory! Simple rules? Check. Roguelite progression? Sure. Predictability? No way!

name: Of Fair and Flesh
description: Sin descripción

name: Fields of Gold
description: Fields of Gold is a casual farming game where you grow crops, expand your fields, and build manufactories. Defend your farm from mischievous rabbits as you transform your land into a thriving agricultural empire. Start playing now and defend your farm before the rabbits take over!

name: Game Developer Simulator
description: In the Simulator of a game developer, you will be able to understand all the subtleties of this profession, understand how the game industry works and all the difficulties of a single developer.

name: Upwards, Rain! The Post Office of Farewells
description: On the outskirts of a small village stands a massive tree whose canopy disappears far above the clouds. While grandiose on the outside, its interior houses the humble Mortem Post, which receives and delivers letters from those who have passed on. Deciding to break protocol to lend a helping wing, Rain, a flighty little courier takes a skittish girl by the name of Mila on an adventure through the inner workings of the post office. Together, they search for a letter containing the last words of someone who seemingly never existed.

name: Dream Station
description: Sin descripción

name: Gakutensoku
description: In the year of new 1940, the earth's population was replaced by androids created by man after the devastating effect of the nuclear war. androids made their own robot utopia, but under the glimmer of the cities, hides a dark secret Seigi Kazuichi was another police officer android doing his duty, capturing evildoers who dares destabilize the peace of the utopia, but one event would change his life forever and entangle him in a series of bizarre murder cases.

name: Scaling the Scale
description: Using the axe you forged using a timber you won from a scaling (estimating timber) contest and the sharpest fish scale you could find, you must scale (climb up) the scale (South African term for a large alcohol container).

name: NBA 2K18
description: Port of NBA 2K18 for PS3 and Xbox 360.

name: Larut
description: A visual novel that retells the story of Nyai Roro Kidul.

name: Into the Depth of the Sky
description: Into the Depth of the Sky is a heartwarming fantasy/mystery/slice-of-life otome game with a dash of action.

name: Storm Shelter
description: A mix between Tetris, physics, and autobattlers. Build a house for the Guy and see if it can withstand a storm of bizarre storm-themed enemies!

name: Webkinz Jr.
description: Webkinz Jr. was the preschool counterpart of Webkinz. It was intended to be a more educational site for a younger audience of children aged 3-6. The site launched in April 2009 and was ultimately shut down some time in 2018.

name: Classified: France '44 - Devils
description:
Fight like devils on the streets of Paris with the new Devils pack, with a new map, special ops missions, weapons and new equipment for British Paras.

New Map – “Paris Streets”
Two new Special Ops missions:
• Man the Barricades
• Thieves Never Rest
Two New Weapon Variants
• Walther P38 “Special”
• FG42 “Flank”
New Clothing Set
• British Para “Devils” set

name: Classified: France '44 - Season Pass Upgrade Pack
description:
The Season Pass Upgrade Pack contains:

DLC 2 - Agent Pack
DLC 3 - Talon Pack
DLC 4 - Devils Pack

Continue the war behind enemy lines with the Agent pack, outfitting your resistance fighters with new gear for your covert operations

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 1 - Episode 02
description: This DLC gives you access to Season 1 Episode 2: Nightmare on Loser Street! Before Cody can ascend to Godhood he’s gotta pass the week long Chill Assessment Test. First stop, the basement!

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 1 - Episode 03
description: This DLC gives you access to Season 1 Episode 3: PB's All That! Pizza Boy’s determined to become a Cool Kid but he’s a fashion disaster! Cody takes him to the skateshop to get decked out!

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 1 - Episode 04
description: This DLC gives you access to Season 1 Episode 4: The Wreckfast Club! Cody and his friends teach Pizza Boy how to be cool in one of raddest spots in the city, East Hella Mall!

name: Banana Blitz
description: Banana Blitz is an exclusively online multiplayer running game where players must use their wits and reflexes to outrun, outsmart, and backstab their friends to be the first to reach the finish. Set traps, unleash chaos, and steal the idol at the last second as you battle for supremacy in thrilling, fast-paced races.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 1 - Episode 05
description: This DLC gives you access to Season 1 Episode 5: The Out-liars! After the Rocket-Coaster fiasco Cody tries to make things up with Pizza Boy by putting off the CAT.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 1 - Episode 06
description: This DLC gives you access to Season 1 Episode 6: Mini's Choice. Three kids hang out at a beach near the dawn of middle school. Mini's starting to realize what life as a Loser truly means.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 2 - Episode 01
description: This DLC gives you access to Season 2 Episode 1: Detective Kitten! After a beatdown at the hands of Cody and Peter, now two totally Average dudes, the Greatboard returns to CHS to set things right.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 2 - Episode 07
description: This DLC gives you access to Season 2 Episode 7: Hider X Seeker! Cody and Peggy, both wracked with guilt over Pizza Boy's return to lameness, embark on a quest for the perfect gift(s) that'll cheer him up.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 2 - Episode 08
description: This DLC gives you access to Season 2 Episode 8: When Mini was There. Mini spirals after scrambling home with broken wings. She calls Rhyme in an attempt to soothe herself. Meanwhile Cody and his friends pack up.

name: Once Clover Died
description: Clover is a black cat who lost one of her 9 lives after being scared to death by a recent break-in. With 8 lives left, she treads the world very carefully to avoid any other incidents that might lead to losing even more.

name: Looppip
description: Looppip is a magical seed that carries an ancient hourglass with the power to turn back time. Your mission is to save the bee hives, essential for the survival of life on Earth, and reverse the environmental collapse threatening nature.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 3 - Episode 10
description: Season 3 Episode 10: Walk on Forever! Cody hangs out with Peter and Mini as they collect yearbook signatures from every person in Hella City!

name: Heróis de Noname
description: A casual, open-world Native Isekai RPG. Explore forests, ruins and caves in search of treasures and use them to defeat powerful enemies and unravel all the mysteries of the world of Noname.

name: Afterlife: The Game
description: After your untimely death in the previous game you start off your afterlife as a lovely ghost on a mission to correct past mistakes and have lots of fun along the way!

name: Not My Part
description: This is story about 'Grace' who is on her way to the Sunday Lake camp, but something happens that makes her meet a famous serial killer at a motel along the way. In this horror movie-like scenario, what role will she play?

name: From The Dust
description: From The Dust is a fun and dynamic shoot'em up action game! Requiring reflexes and motor coordination. Fight steampunk machines to save your village. Can you complete this challenge?

name: Speed Factor
description: An old-school racing game featuring 2D pixelated visuals, inspired by 80s and 90s classics, arcade-style gameplay, rock songs and high speed!

name: Dear Edwin
description: A woman's death has sparked intrigue in a small, derelict city district. Follow a young detective as he unravels a mystery that runs deeper than he might have known, and help him to make decisions that will alter the course of the story for better or for worse.

name: Who Dies First?
description: You will be put into silly and funny situations in real life where you have to predict who will die first. Try to predict as many correct as possible to get the highest IQ score. Compete with other players in intelligence.

name: Under Your Moon
description:
You're entirely alone-- until you're not. Entirely out of place, entirely by surprise, a mysterious person appears in your apartment. The first person that you've seen in years-- and then they're gone again, just as quickly. It's undeniable that something is changing, and that is has to with this stranger--
And something tells you that you'll see them again.

name: Prettyboy Inc. is Hiring!
description: A short horror visual novel about a job interview.

name: Tsumugi no Hanayome
description: Sin descripción

name: Harukanaru Nirai Kanai
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario's Egg
description: Mario needs to collect Yoshi eggs for some reason.

name: Mario's Journey
description: A very basic platform game made using Trisoft's Mario engine.

name: Super Mario Bros: Hello
description: Mario goes on another adventure. Yeah.

name: Vortexion
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Greetings
description: Mario needs to manipulate switches in order to collect all the red coins.

name: Echoes of the House
description: Christopher arrives at his grandmother's countryside home late at night for a seemingly ordinary visit. But soon after reuniting, he begins to notice something isn't right. The familiar setting warps into a place of unease, and the mystery that unravels is far more complex than anyone could expect.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?: Deluxe Upgrade
description: The Deluxe Upgrade offers you more than 3,000 additional questions, on top of the 6,000+ questions in the basic game!

name: Outposts of the Wasteland
description: Outposts Of The Wasteland is a new episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports (complevel 2) made by various members of Doomer Boards. This project theme was inspired by the Mad Max and Borderlands franchises.

name: Mahjong Riddles: Egypt
description:
Welcome to the mysterious world of Ancient Egypt! Solve mahjong levels and collect artifacts to uncover secrets of Giza valley, Old city, Desert and Nile.
Discover how the Great Pyramid of Giza was constructed, how Egyptians learned to read hieroglyphs, why Only the pharaoh could own a cat in Ancient Egypt and many more surprising facts.
Simple and engaging gameplay of mahjong solitaire is the best way to relax. We made it even better with new game features: you will find huge treasures, tricky locks, new bonus tiles and more. Solving some layouts is not easy, but you can always use powerups to beat the most challenging levels.

name: Waternet
description: Vircon32 port of Waternet, which is a multiplatform water pipe puzzle game written for old consoles and handhelds.

name: Deckarium
description: A deck-building pet simulator. Play pet cards to populate your terrarium or aquarium, be on the lookout for card-packs to expand your deck, keep your creatures fed to collect coins, and use them to buy more pets! But look out for ghosts! They hunger for the souls of your pets.

name: Shining Hero
description: A single-player roguelike game with pixel art that blends deck-building with grid-based turn-based strategy.

name: Babette
description: There's this old 90s virtual pet game at a yard sale. It's called 'Babette'. Now you can play with Babette the cat from the comfort of your bedroom. Just you and her! Keep Babette happy by playing with her, feeding her, and more! Except... Babette's more than just a cat. And she's coming for you.

name: Freckles
description: These are cute little creatures that come from the planet Mercury. On a mission to earth to the united nations, the freckles are challenged with the earth's space junk. While flying there spaceship they accidently crash into a fridge, crashing in the backyard of a greedy family named Maus.

name: The Devil's Whisper
description: A psychological horror Visual Novel with a full voice cast. Immerse yourself in a haunting mystery filled with dark drama and a touch of romance. Multiple thrilling alternate endings to play through! Choose who lives and who dies.

name: Spectral Prison
description: Trapped in an endless cycle, David Echo must navigate haunted houses and terrifying dimensions to escape the sinister warden. Find hidden keys, avoid monsters, and break free from the nightmare. Can you survive?

name: Puzzle Land
description: Puzzle Land is a remake of the gameboy game Daedalian opus also known as puzzle road in japan.

name: Manickologi
description: Manickologi is a game about getting sidetracked on your way back home. Follow mani the manickologist and his robot friend Stefan on their adventure. Swap between characters to make use of their unique skillsets. Collect hidden treasures and complete quests.

name: Sepulchron
description: An atmospheric puzzle-horror game where you have 72 in-game hours to escape with your life. Solve challenging puzzles that require logical deduction during the day, survive assaults from hostile ghosts at night, and uncover the mystery behind Astor Manor.

name: The Last Human In The Universe
description: You are the last human that exists, and you wake up trapped in a spaceship full of dangers lurking around you. You must perform maintenance on the ship to keep it functioning until you reach Earth. Once on Earth, will everything start again?

name: Party on Hallow Grove
description: Talk to kooky guests, trade party items, and explore Death’s mansion as you throw him the spookiest birthday party ever.

name: Deep Space Cache
description: Deep Space Cache is a short incremental game about mining asteroids for resources and converting them into valuable bits.

name: The Curse of the Demon Tree
description: A top down 2D JRPG exploring the stages of grief and loss in a post-apocalyptic landscape.

name: Zombie Cards: Survival Showdown
description: Zombie Cards: Survival Showdown is a card game with a zombie survival theme.

name: Puztrix
description:
Puztrix is a remake of the Gravnic game from inside the NES Puzznic game.

Vircon32 Game Features:
- 80 levels of the original game
- 2 skins
- High score saving and submitting for the original levels
- ability to turn music & sound on/off

name: My Arms Are Longer Now
description:
You are a yucky long-armed thief. Snake through levels, retract like a vacuum cord, or put on a sock to seduce a lonely guard - whatever it takes to pull off the perfect heist!
You are a yucky long-armed thief. Snake through levels, retract like a vacuum cord, or put on a sock to seduce a lonely guard - whatever it takes to pull off the perfect heist!

name: RetroTime
description:
RetroTime for vircon32 is a game containing 8 retro based games playable in 3 game modes being Retro Carousel, Time Attack and Lives mode. The game is a port from the Playdate version which was a port from the SDL2 version from my competition entry for Fuze 4 for Nintendo switch, in collaboration with Wireframe magazine.

There are the 8 retro based games implemented in this game:
- Invaders
- Brick Breaker
- Toady
- Snakey
- Bubble Buster
- Block Stacker
- Color Invasion
- Faster Dave

name: Formula 1
description: A Small Fictive Formula 1 Game & Watch style game with high score keeping.

name: Mazethingie
description:
Mazethingie is a maze generator / game.
Generate mazes of different sizes and solve them.

name: Rubido
description: Rubido is a little chinese checkers or solitaire game with four difficulties.

name: Get To The Top
description:
A challenging game about climbing various terrain areas using a pair of wire hooks.

You have to climb to the top using hooks.
Use the keyboard to move, and the mouse to control your hands and hooks (or gamepad if you are not in enough pain).
Only the most persistent will make it to the top.

name: DistortedCode: Seija no Nokoriga
description:
DistortedCode is a Japanese horror otome game in development for the Nintendo Switch.

"I am––
about to be killed soon."

It's the end of June, and summer vacation is just around the corner.
The students are in high spirits as the longest break of the year approaches. In stark contrast to them is a girl with a cold, resigned look in her eyes.

That girl has a secret.

name: Asunder II
description: More than a decade in the making this groundbreaking humorous fantasy ARPG is actually fun to play. But be forewarned it's a difficult game.

name: Mental Hellacious
description: The Most Difficult Action Climbing Game Hold to adjust jump distance simple controls. You'll likely fail countless times before mastering the jump. A single moment of error can ruin everything. Enjoy the experience the process of improving.

name: 9mm Girls The Visual Novel
description:
9mm Girls The Visual Novel is an LGBTQ+ urban fantasy/action project produced by the duo Soliko6, based on the 9mm Girls Webcomic.

The project focuses on the relations between you (the player) and complex characters while following an intricate storyline taking place in the dark megalopolis of Skyline City.
Your choices through the game will impact the ending but also the bonds you wish to build with the characters.

name: Mechanic Man
description: The evil scientist Dr. Bronze has stolen manufacturing equipment in order to assemble his own army of killer robots! Join our brave hero, Steel, as he journeys to take down the CU brand androids and storm Bronze’s facility to save the world. Run, jump, and shoot through ten stages filled with dangerous foes, tight platforming and intimidating bosses. It’s now or never, so fight, Steel! For everlasting peace!

name: Drone Attack: Pig Irruption
description: Drone Attack: Pig Irruption is a fast-paced, action-packed mobile game where players control drones to fend off a mischievous invasion of pigs. Utilize a variety of drones, including the powerful new Combat Mosquito, to strategically destroy waves of pigs. With exciting new features like soul absorption mechanics, quick bomb access, and a revamped interface, this game offers intense fun for those who enjoy tactical challenges and destruction. Join the battle, crush the pig invasion, and watch sunflowers grow where enemies fall!

name: Proportions
description: Proportions is an indie asymmetrical game where players take on the roles of either a giant or minis. The giant’s objective is to catch the minis, who must use their agility and cunning to evade capture. Designed with streamers in mind, the game features proximity chat to enhance the immersive experience and foster dynamic interactions.

name: Sagaia
description: Darius II was redesigned for it's initial version for the international market with shorter stages and less bosses with less health, but higher overall difficulty to balance the changes out. As a result, some routes and bosses were removed completely.

name: Blood & Company
description:
Blood & Company is a work of interactive fiction with multiple endings, and about 3,000 total words in total, written for The Queer Vampire IF Jam.

"Your name is Zach. You’re 23, you were an art major in the two years of college you completed, oh, and you’re a vampire."

Play as Zach, who has survived his blood-sucking life so far by keeping to himself, never getting attached to the people he relies on for sustenance. Tonight, though, he's starting to feel a connection with the chatty grad student he plans to bite...

name: Boxing Room
description: A boxing game where you must land as many punches on your opponent as possible before he falls to the ground.

name: Shawarma Legend
description: Have you ever wondered what it’s like to run your very own shawarma restaurant? Immerse yourself in Shawarma Legend, the newest and most exciting cooking game that lets you step into a world of culinary delight. Fulfill customer orders with precision and keep your restaurant thriving.

name: Cyberworld
description: You protect the inhabitants of newfound worlds throughout the galaxy.

name: Adventure 2600 Reboot
description: Nearly 30 years after the original Atari 2600 classic comes a fan-made remake by PA G&T! Experience the game that pioneered the titular genre with 16-bit graphics, music, and other quality-of-life features. Explore the kingdom, collect the keys, and recover the Enchanted Chalice, lest the fearsome dragons eat you first. Try the game on different difficulty modes, or even customize your game for maximum enjoyment. Everything you remember and more are here in Adventure 2600 Reboot, the fresh coat of paint Atari never even made!

name: Sacrificial God
description: You were sacrificed and now have to find god. You can do this by talking to other creatures that were sacrificed. Will you be able to do this? Find it out by speaking to the creatures of Heaven!

name: Air Rescue I
description: You fly your chopper in underground caverns to rescue captives.

name: Hole-y Golf
description: Control the size of the hole (aka cup, target) in golf from underground to help your dad win matches. Don't be too suspicious or you'll get caught.

name: Staars
description: In Staars, you play as a volunteer investigating unknown activities in a simulated environment. During a 24-hour test, events appear randomly, and you enter the virtual house via a portal to investigate. Observe, categorize, and report events based on Space, Time, Anomalies, and Reality.

name: One Skill
description: In this platformer you have 4 different skills but you can only use one at a time. Choose a skill to complete each of the sections across 4 levels.

name: Swan Song
description: Solve puzzles in an old music box by creating your own music scales. Play your composition by cranking the box and watch it come to life! Will you get your little goose safely to it's nest?

name: Solitaire
description: The classic card solitaire, now for Vircon32, with difficulty selection (drawing 1, 2 or 3 cards).

name: Chipwits
description: You have to program a small robot named ChipWit.

name: Super Mario Bros: Adventure Journey
description: Mario goes on an adventure and a journey.

name: Super Mario Bros: Journey to Peach
description: Mario goes on a journey to save Peach.

name: Super Mario Bros: Coin Quest
description: Mario needs to collect red coins again.

name: Super Mario Bros: Kill Bowser
description: Join Mario in his quest to... kill Bowser!?

name: Super Luigi Paradise
description: Help Luigi explore this water filled paradise!

name: Code Moo
description: Code Moo is an official game for the Chick-fil-A brand that is available on the Chick-fil-A website and mobile app for a few weeks in the Summer each year. By playing the game each week, players can help the cows vandalize Circus Burger establishments and win vouchers for real world Chick-fil-A menu items.

name: Super Mario Bros: Bowser's Terror
description: Save the Mushroom Kingdom from Bowser's reign of terror!

name: Super Mario Bros: Dark Days
description: Mario with guns and blood!

name: Heaven: Dare mo Kimi wo Shiranai
description: Explore the incomprehensible mind of a person through the main character who has amnesia.

name: Super Mario Bros: Mushroom Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: Yoshi Click and Go
description: Click to shoot, and click Yoshi to jump!

name: Super Mario Bros: Koopa Chaos
description: King Koopa is causing chaos, as usual.

name: Mario's Run
description: Drop blocks and springs onto the course to influence the outcome of the game as Mario walks back and forth like a Goomba.

name: Save the Goombas
description: Use the mouse to break stuff and press switches in order to get all the Goombas to reach the goal.

name: The Whitaker's Library
description:
Welcome to the Final Days of James Whitaker's Library...

You’ve taken on what seems like a simple task: helping pack up the remnants of a once-thriving library.

name: Super Mario Bros: Kingdom Troubles
description: Save the Mushroom Kingdom from trouble!

name: Mario the Mathematician
description: Solve math problems to attack Bowser and his minions with fireballs!

name: Super Mario Bros: Shine Pursuit
description: Toadsworth has challenged Mario to a shine collecting game! Collect all the shines in a level to progress.

name: Super Mario Bros.: Crimson Hours
description: Mario with guns and blood! And explosions!

name: Land Before Time: Adventure Valley
description: "The Land Before Time: Adventure Valley" is a Land Before Time arcade game originally put on Cartoon Network's website, but has since then been taken off after the Land Before Time TV series stopped airing.

name: SuperPosition
description: Sokoban style quantum puzzle game. Make your way through many variations of one level at once using one sequence of moves!

name: Eastern Cuisine Tycoon
description: A traditional Chinese food simulation cooking game. Play the role of a talented Chinese food chef, experiencing the production process of traditional Chinese cuisine firsthand, gradually transforming your small inn into a renowned food paradise.

name: Midheaven: Winds of Ambition
description:
Midheaven: Winds of Ambition follows the tale of a young Mahyine (an original species of the Midheaven saga, with naga-like features) noble in court who determines to follow their ambitions, along with the presence of one of the four Regals.

Winds of Ambition is a stats-raising visual novel, where every choice can result in the most fatal outcome. The objective of the game is keeping the protagonist alive for 12 seasons, and marry one of the four Regals.

name: Yume
description: Yume on PC is a side-scrolling action/platformer where you play as young Yin, trapped in the world of dreams. Armed with a sword and a mysterious stone, he will have to face hordes of enemies to find the key to the mystery of this decidedly unwelcoming world.

name: Best Served Cold
description: Can you mix a cocktail while eye-to-eye with a criminal? Find out in Best Served Cold, a murder mystery set in a bustling speakeasy where you serve customers, make friends and enemies, and solve crimes. At the Nightcap bar, prohibition is a killer… and so are some of your customers!

name: Extinction Facility
description: Extinction Facility is an immersive VR horror fan game that brings a fresh and terrifying twist to the Gorilla Tag-inspired genre. Set in a dark, sprawling facility, the game draws heavily from chilling inspirations like "Big Scary" and "Scary Baboon," creating an atmosphere filled with tension, suspense, and unexpected frights.

name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix Mini-Game
description: On the website for the video game Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix there was plans for a promotional mini-game to be released alongside it. The game was labeled as coming soon under the "Mini-Game" tab on the official website for the game, however was never released. No details of the game were ever released and it is uncertain what the contents of the game were to be, apart from the game being built in Adobe Flash based on the link being labeled as "flashgame" within the site's HTML code.

name: Fuel Station: Drive & Pumping
description: Inherit an abandoned gas station in a desolate desert. Raise funds, renovate, and modernize the station. Expand your services to attract more customers. Test your entrepreneurial skills and maybe you'll become rich.

name: Pao Pao
description: Pao Pao is a wild mix of culinary diving and animal madness—where you become the ultimate restaurant boss and management guru! Gather ingredients, go fishing, and expand your spot solo or with friends. Every order turns into an epic adventure… Jump in and experience it for yourself!

name: Defense Breakers
description: A roguelike tower defense game. Pick your players, collect treasures, and break through the enemy's heavy barriers. Each expedition brings a new experience.

name: The Oneironaut
description: Dive into the surreal world of 'The Oneironaut,' where you'll race through the dreams of artists in this mesmerizing parkour runner. Jump, slide, and vault your way through fantastical landscapes, with each airborne vault propelling you to greater heights.

name: Sadball
description: Chase pins as a bowling ball with dreamlike abilities in a surreal bowling alley.

name: Anterris
description: Collect and train powerful creatures, known as Antera, as you battle through dungeons. Discover rare loot and evolve your squad by freely swapping between creatures while battling enemies in a fast-paced creature-collecting action RPG!

name: Hidden Cats in Tokyo
description: Hidden Cats in Tokyo is a hidden object adventure game where you must vaccinate all the cats in Tokyo before they turn into dangerous monsters. Collect cards of heroes, monsters, and cat things. Join the adventure and fight the huge monster with your giant robot in this fun hidden object game!

name: Proverbs
description: Proverbs is a picross/minesweeper hybrid featuring a single ENORMOUS puzzle, inspired by Bruegel the Elder's 1559 painting "Netherlandish Proverbs"

name: Touhou Saibanmu: Rookie Attorney Legendry
description: A puzzle-solving detective game based on the Touhou series. It mainly tells the story of Marisa Kirisame who, by chance, becomes a lawyer. The story is divided into three chapters, each with multiple endings.

name: Callous
description: 1 large map for vanilla Doom 2 using alpha textures.

name: Journey to Incrementalia
description: Journey to Incrementalia is an incremental auto-battler RPG about a necromancer on a mysterious quest. Cast diabolical spells, summon an army and open the gates of hell on your quest to break down 99 legendary walls on the road to the lost city of Incrementalia.

name: Love in an Enchanted Realm
description: Lost in a magical world where true love is your only escape - form powerful connections, outsmart deadly enemies, and resist the temptation of a dangerous villain who swears you're destined to be his.

name: Slitherise
description: A snake robot climbs up a mysterious world. The only control is the mouse, and the goal is to aim higher.

name: Cube Snake
description: Slither through a retro-futuristic cyberpunk world in this 3D Cubic take of the classic 1976 & 1998 Snake games.

name: What Remains
description: A non-linear, eerie visual novel inspired by Ukrainian folklore. Go caroling with Goat, Bear, and Granny to make choices that decide the villagers' fate, save dozens, or lead to disasters. Learn how powerful words and silence can be.

name: Morningtide Motel
description: Your motel is busy for the first time in years. Antsy city-folk and dispossessed teens flood your rooms, and you can barely keep up. Now, after a week of all-nighters spent managing reservations, room service requests, and Yup! reviews, you begin to wonder… could you even fall asleep if you tried?

name: The Fall: Act I
description: The story of three foreign students at a private British boarding school. Becoming information brokers within the school walls brought them money and respect, but knowledge can also bring trouble.

name: Idili
description: A first-person Survival Horror video game. Discover Sardinian tradition and experience its terrifying legends as they come to life in your hands. Investigate, explore, escape. You will have to survive with all your strength to uncover its secrets.

name: Ascension: The Immortal Alchemist
description:
Ascension follows the trials and tribulations of an Immortal Alchemist and his quest throughout time to transmute humans in to gods. Players descend into an ancient labyrinth where their souls are tested by cosmic forces to challenge the limitations of their mortality. Do you have what it takes?

Ascension is a modern resurrection of the classic 3D Action Adventure Genre - Inspired by the legendary writings of Hermes Trismegistus - a figure who rose to prominence in the mystery schools of Hellenistic Egypt & Greece, and whose timeless teachings are as relevant today; as they were when they were written.

Action-adventure, puzzle, platforming, atmospheric, difficult, speedrunner, escape room, maze

name: Please Smile
description: A 3D platformer with 60 increasingly challenging rooms. Manipulate time to reverse the game's movements. Redirect gravity onto objects to reach the most impossible places. Jump, run, shoot, and dash, as only with all your abilities will you escape.

name: 3:33 A.M.
description: 3:33 A.M. is a 33 map Halloween Horror megawad designed to creep and crawl with precisely 333 lines per map and a build time of 13 days.

name: Carnage Kart X
description: Carnage Kart X is a retro-inspired hack n' slash experience combining the feel of classic karting games from the early 90s with Vampire Survivors-like gameplay, combining hand-drawn 2D pixel art and low-poly 3D models for a new perspective on the Survivors-like genre. It's style is reminiscent of something you'd play at the arcade down to the rockin' over-the-top music and over-sized blood spurts/body parts flying off of enemies.

name: Camelbirds
description: Saddle up a giant bird and race to victory. Overtake your rivals, use various tools, and overcome obstacles on thrilling tracks. Prove you're the best rider in these wild races!

name: The Redundant
description: Step into the metallic boots of an abandoned robot and fight back against an army of virus-infected machines. Sneak or battle your way around the facility, uncover its secrets, and isolate each section from the network - before it's too late...

name: Doctor Root
description: A platform game where you must use your drill skills to advance through the stages.

name: Kraktures
description: Collect, and fight powerful creatures known as Kraktures in turn-based or realtime RPG battles.

name: Mad Miner 2
description: The second game of Mad Miner, a dystopia where humans are forced to live in mines, takes place in the third dimension! Our main character joins the research team as a miner on a mission to dig deeper with his pickaxe.

name: Unicycle Giraffe
description: Unicycle Giraffe is a balancing game about giraffes, fancy hats & making new friends. Jump on a unicycle and earn yourself some coin to pay back your debts in this cute and colourful physics wobbler.

name: QuizMi
description:
A brand new quiz trivia mobile game that builds on the legacy of QuizUp and brings a fresh take on the genre.

Play against others worldwide with exciting multiplayer features, challenge your knowledge with a variety of categories and questions, and experience the excitement of a brand new quiz trivia game.

name: Ragdoll Rumble
description: Ragdoll Rumble is a chaotic party game where toy wizards unleash wild spells in explosive spellcasting battles. Cast crazy abilities, outsmart your opponents, and prove you are the dominant doll!

name: Football Manager Quiz
description: Although it's based on the planet's best football management game on PC, console and PSP, Football Manager Quiz takes a different spin on the genre. Instead of taking your team to the top of the Premier League with cunning tactics and wheeler-dealer transfer skills, success is based entirely on your footie-trivia knowledge.

name: Haunting: The Rosefield Manor
description: Haunting: The Rosefield Manor is a carefully designed single-player psychological horror game powered by Unreal Engine 5. The spirit of Rosefield Manor still lingers, and it is up to you to uncover its mystery.

name: Emerald Isle
description: Trying to dodge the Bermuda triangle you parachute out of a plane and land on the mysterious Emerald Isle. But now you have to find a way back home...

name: Nexus Station
description: Nexus Station is a cross-platform Social Sandbox MMO. With endless possibilities; from world creation, crafting, co-op PvE dungeons, PvP brawler, competitive gameplay and more, Nexus Station is going to have endless amounts of exciting and varied content that you can be part of creating.

name: Sword Art Online: Unleash Blading
description:
Sword Art Online Unleash Blading was a mobile game based on the Sword Art Online Alicization saga.
It was originale called "Alicization Blading" in Japan and "Alicization Rising Steel" worldwide, but it was renamed in 2021.

The game closed on January 16, 2023.

name: Beep Boop
description: Beep is back, and this time he has a sidekick, Boop! Blast your way through 100 challenging levels and 5 boss fights, in this classic elimination platformer, modelled on the legendary Bubble Bobble series.

name: Let's Watch Steamboat Willie
description:
Two film nerds sit down for a comfy evening watching old movies. Next up is Steamboat Willie, and they quickly take to bickering.
By the time the cartoon is over, one of them will be dead.

name: Nazar
description:
Experience the world's first fusion of FMV genre and 2D platforming in this revolutionary sci-fi adventure. Explore Cappadocia's mystic realm where fortune-telling meets quantum physics. Join Nazar, unlock psychic powers, and race to prevent a dark future in this genre-defying journey!

Step into a world where ancient mysticism meets cutting-edge science in this groundbreaking FMV adventure from internationally acclaimed game designer Dr. Eray Dinç. Set in the mesmerizing landscapes of Cappadocia, Turkey's most enigmatic region, this game weaves a tapestry of Anatolian lore, arcane rituals, and futuristic technology.

Inspired by the time-honored art of Turkish shadow puppetry, this unique experience fuses 2D platforming with interactive cinema, all set to a haunting score by legendary composer Inon Zur. But what truly sets this game apart is its revolutionary mechanic: your ability to peer into the future.

name: Project Slippi
description: Project Slippi is a set of modifications for Super Smash Bros. Melee, which adds several quality-of-life improvements to the game, of which are commonly used within the competitive scene. Among the most popular mod is Slippi Online, a Dolphin-based mod which allows rollback netcode for Melee over the internet. Other features include the ability to automatically save replays through the Slippi Launcher on PC and on the Nintendo Wii with Nintendont-Slippi.

name: An Angel's Final Desire
description:
Play as Emil, who had a fight with his best friend Quinn and they are now missing and he has to find them before it's too late

Can you save Quinn, in the end?

Can you save the child?

name: Gnomecart Havoc
description: A roguelite shooter with snakelike elements. You control a group of Gnomes sitting in carts trying to take back their home. Explore the cursed, ever changing mine, upgrade your crew with treasures you’ll find in your journey and destroy every monster that stands in your way.

name: Rain Check
description:
Rain Check is a mystery thriller visual novel set in a coastal city with unusual weather patterns where nothing seems quite right.

Join Theodore as he turns to a wolf he meets, along with a clashing team of investigators, in a desperate attempt to find answers and uncover the truth about the strange phenomena of the city, and whatever else may be lurking in the shadows.

name: Re:Fragment - Absolute Ambition
description: We all dream of a bright future ahead, but life doesn't always turn out how we expect. Yuuma, the protagonist, lives a peaceful life until the student council president proposes a new controversial policy that changes everything they once knew forever.

name: Inventris TD
description: A tower defense shooter where the combat happens inside your inventories.

name: Hit n' Bit
description: A dark fantasy Metroidvania platformer. Embark on two different journeys where you will fight monsters, explore a story-rich world, and encounter challenging puzzles. Reunite the royal siblings, defy the machinations of old gods, and redefine destiny.

name: UnHumanize
description: Can technology help humans achieve their dreams, or is fighting fate a big gamble for humanity?

name: Sacabambaspis' Friendly Adventure
description: A short and friendly adventure as a Sacabambaspis!

name: Limbus Company: Season 5 - Oblivion
description:
Season 5: Oblivion is the fifth Season of Limbus Company, released on October 10, 2024.

It consists of the game's seventh Story Chapter (Canto VII: The Dream Ending), centered around the character Don Quixote from the homonymous literary source, the 5th Mirror Dungeon, Line 5 of Refraction Railway, and a number of Identities and E.G.O based on story content.

name: Blackjack and Pomodoro Mystery
description:
"Human, go to work."

In the library, you are stuck with Blackjack, an unknown living creature that looks like a cat. Unexpectedly, lots of tomatoes appear in the library. It's also up to you and BJ to solve the mystery and identify the person who left the tomatoes lying around.

This is Pomodoro timer which has 25 minutes working-5 minutes resting and 60 minutes working-10 minute resting plans for player to select and work along with the moving black cat playing around the room.

name: Dysto-wanderer
description: Dive into a puzzle adventure in the post-apocalyptic world of dysto-wanderer. Join Pia, lost in the toxic slums of a ruined city, as she searches for a safe place. Explore a destroyed civilization, solve intricate puzzles, and survive the harsh environment along the way.

name: Science Sleuths Vol. 1: Mysteries of the Blob and the Exploding Lawnmowers
description: Sin descripción

name: Mythical Love
description:
Welcome to Mythic High, the highschool of mythical creatures where we can have great moments together with species and sex equality.
You can choose to be one of them and build your relationship to learn more about different kinds of love. So young and colourful. BUT sometimes, when something goes overboard, everything could collapse apart, including love. So choose wisely.

name: Yume Kakigori
description: Experience a text adventure unlike any other, communicate with characters through the art of color mixing.

name: Vampire Domain
description: Summon hordes of minions to defend your realm against invading heroes in this fast-paced fantasy strategy game. Unlock permanent upgrades, new levels and more advanced minions to survive the ever-growing threat.

name: The Butterfly Dreams
description: A visual novel exploring reality, imagination, and the gap between them that we believe to be there.

name: Hellfire
description: You are legendary hero Ulysses and are set with three repeating tasks which get more difficult each time you are tried. The tasks lead you to the slopes of Mount Olympus, to the Temple of Knossos where the ghastly Minotaur hides and finally to an unknown labyrinth in which monsters await you.

name: Hexia
description: "HEXIA" is a real-time multiplayer battle game that combines strategy and action. It is a new sport set in the near future where players control special figures and fight in a virtual space. You can enjoy various modes such as online PvP rating matches, custom matches where you can freely set the number of players and the field, and gear challenges where you can practice and strengthen your characters.

name: Wanagiri
description: Wanagiri is a short visual novel where you play as Kamila, who accidentally isekai'ed to an uncompleted book that your friend wrote. How will you end the story, and will you be back there again someday?

name: Lurking Darkness
description:
Lurking Darkness is a short, PS1-styled survival horror game about what happens if you get to close to the dangers that hide in the shadows...

On September 14th, 1990, four friends would enter the Greenlock Woods for an overnight camping trip.

Two days later, they were reported missing.

As part of a search party, your goal is to find any possible survivors. Keep your eyes peeled for anyone, and don't stray off the path.

name: Shades
description: A curse has been laid on the Island of Arulan which causes people and objects to vanish and reappear randomly. Also the curse brought monsters. It is your task to find out what causes all that trouble.

name: Corrida das Blogueiras 6: A Maldição dos Zumbis
description: In this exciting game, you will face 8 super challenging stages, all set in the glamorous Corrida Das Blogueiras High School! Run through the corridors, jump over obstacles, defeat zombies and show that you have the charisma to be the school's Ultimate Blogger!

name: The Shade Forest
description: Fabulous, FREE and fun 90's inspired platformer game for Android, iOS and PC. Help Drag Queen Amanda Sparks to survive the Shade Forest and rescue her friend from the evil hands of the Hypocritics gang!

name: Meteor Shower
description: Sin descripción

name: Barheim
description: A single-player, 3D Time Management Tower Defense where players experience the chaos of mixing drinks and maintaining a bar while defending themselves from thirsty Vikings!

name: Lost in Tropics
description: Lost in Tropics: Embark on an unforgettable survival adventure where the lush, unpredictable tropics become your testing ground. In this immersive game, you find yourself stranded on a mysterious island, where every corner hides both breathtaking beauty and perilous challenges.

name: Infinity Sweeper
description: Infinity Sweeper is similar to the classic Minesweeper, but turned into an endless rogue-lite adventure. Navigate through an ever-expanding grid filled with dangerous traps, enemies, and valuable treasures, trying to survive as long as possible.

name: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth Special Trial Version
description:
A special demo for Likes a Dragon: Infinite Wealth included in Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name.

This trial version of the upcoming game let the player explore a portion of Honolulu as Kiryu Kazuma and have original scenes not included in the full game.

name: Problem Solver Club
description: Sin descripción

name: Nothing.SeriOS
description: A tiny PSP game made in 48 hours. Play 3 mini games together!

name: Trilogi Keluarga Bahagia Side Story: Sulastri Si Tukang Jamu
description:
Sulastri hasn't paid the tuition fee yet.
However, he did not have enough money to pay, considering that his mother could not sell herbs because of illness.
Because of Mrs. Jamilah's kindness, Sulastri was given an additional 6 months deadline.
Will Sulastri be able to pay off her tuition fees after selling herbs to replace her mother for 6 months?

name: Trilogi Keluarga Bahagia Side Story: Yuni dan Puzzle Ajaib
description:
Yuni has been separated from her mother and older sister since she was 7 years old.
One day, she finds a magical puzzle piece that can grant her wish.
But to make this happen, Yuni must take all the pieces from those around her; Rio is a delinquent, Haryanto is smart, and Benjamin is kind.
Can Yuni put all the pieces together and make her dream come true?

name: Idumea
description: This is a re-release of Doom 2 in City Only MAP23 - Idumea, now including an additional version for lower and mid-range computers. A very large and non-linear MBF21-compatible (-cl 21) city map based around slaughter combat.

name: Silent Sadie
description: A puzzle-platformer in Hollywood's golden age. Join Sadie on her quest to become a star, tackling puzzles, stealth challenges, and fast-paced platforming. Inspired by silent film legends, this game combines humor, visual gags, and challenging gameplay in a charming adventure.

name: Godstone Tactics
description: An indie turn-based strategy game. Position your animal heroes in the isometric arena, protect your King, and defeat the enemy King. Adapt your tactics on various boards and master the strategic depth to win.

name: Wool at the Gates
description: Defend your base from hordes of invading sheep. Fight as a hero with powerful abilities or shapeshift into a flying eyeball to traverse the battlefield and command troops. Build your defenses and economy while creating synergies that unlock class bonuses and perks for your hero, troops, and towers.

name: Sonar Scout
description: Pilot your submarine to activate and reestablish a network of beacons while carefully utilizing your sonar to navigate the low-visibility depths of the ocean.

name: The Great Fluctus
description: A relaxing game to zone out for an hour, all while exploring cozy alien worlds, trading with mutants, rebuilding society and saving the world - no pressure, right?

name: Anarchy Hops
description: Play as a violent bunny with a giant pair of scissors.

name: Dr. Priori’s Time Escape
description: Welcome back to the Curiosity Shop of Dr. A. Priori. Explore the building and unlock rooms full of mysteries. Use time bubbles to change the environment and solve puzzles. Unravel the mystery! Play this first-person puzzle escape room game solo or co-op with up to 4 players.

name: Deepest Dungeons
description: Venture into the ever-shifting labyrinth of Deepest Dungeons, a rogue-like with extraction elements. Explore a maze that changes with each attempt, battle enemies, avoid deadly traps and collect gear. Survive long enough to reach deeper levels, or escape with your belongings and try a new descend.

name: Hi! These Are Your Eyeballs
description: Our eyes define and shape everything that happens in life. Become a delivery courier for EyeBallStore and help the residents of Limb Alley see the world in a new light after a long time spent in darkness.

name: Galactic Caretaker
description: A space civilisation management game. Play as a Galactic Caretaker, controlling the growth of developing civilisations. Ensure each society reaches their galactic exploration potential….but not before they are ready.

name: Island Keeper
description: Earth's pollution is at record highs and only you can save your planet! Collect rubbish, recycle; improve yourself and your base. Explore the archipelago of islands in the endless ocean, its inhabitants as well as the underwater world.

name: Stage Cleared
description: You're just trying to beat a platformer, but something is stalking you outside. Keep an eye on your security cams while you’re gaming and stop the intruder from getting in. Stay sharp, or it’s game over.

name: Pinevale Settlements
description: Build and manage your own thriving colony in this engaging simulator. Balance resource management, strategic planning, and crafting to grow your settlement from the ground up. Perfect your strategy and watch your colony flourish!

name: Zaraq
description: A roguelike deckbuilder where you have access to a forbidden arcade from the 80's. Craft the best deck of symbols, artifact and spells to score the maximum amount of points to beat Zaraq.

name: Weatherman
description: Weatherman is a fast thinking puzzle simulation game where you rapidly assess gadgets to predict the weather. Your reports save lives.

name: Nightshade Mysteries: Eternal Moon
description: In 1930s Southern Europe, dauntless archaeologist Helena Nightshade gets entangled in the mysteries surrounding an ominous eternal lunar eclipse, prophesied by estranged Moon Worshippers also known as the Anaxagori.

name: Go North
description: experience the first immersive maze adventure ever as you help Dara meet the Maze God and get her wish granted by navigating countless beautiful mazes and labyrinths. but something sinister seems to be corrupting the mazes. something… or someone.

name: Nnnnnight
description: Morning has ended, and night has begun. Somewhere, many people are spending their respective nights—walking their dogs, studying in their rooms, striving at work... You observe the night until "she" becomes "morning". "NNNNNIGHT" is an adventure game themed around night.

name: Fix This House
description: A relaxing and minimalist puzzle game where your task is to fix the building using a variety of blocks. Enjoy the interactive environment, soothing music, and sounds of nature. Solve puzzles, explore the world, and take your time.

name: Loss
description: Uncover the truth in Loss, a story-driven game about a teenage boy recalling the tragedies of his family. Explore a house, solve puzzles and gather items. All while fighting the ghosts from your past.

name: Steam Veins
description: The vampires help humanity with steampunk technologies, BUT you were bitten—now hunt the Master Lord King Vampire before you become his servant.

name: Spherebuddie 64
description: Embark on an adventure through vibrant 3D environments crafted with nostalgic pixel art, blending classic aesthetics with modern gameplay mechanics. Maneuver your spherical hero through challenging platforming with precise jumps and dash.

name: Mindfate
description: After awakening in a mental hospital, Yuriko’s search for an escape turns into a journey through her disturbing past. With each step forward, normality fades away revealing a surreal world where nothing is as it seems.

name: ETea
description: Help Glorbo master the art of making boba to satisfy customers and take down bosses in this unique blend of simulation and bobarista action!

name: Eden Survivors
description: Welcome, hackers, you're being transferred to Eden City to defend its citizens against the alien threat! Eden Survivors is a single-player survivor-like auto-shooter where players must defeat hordes of alien invaders until the extraction time.

name: Astral Wield
description: Embark on Felix's journey to stop an evil King from starting a great war between kingdoms.

name: One Room Dungeon
description: A roguelike team builder, auto-battler meets inventory management, where you are a little dungeon keeper who has to fit minions, artifacts, and items in a very tidy way in his tiny one-room dungeon to empower himself to protect the dungeon from the raiding adventurers.

name: The Lust City
description: You’re a seasoned explorer on a mission with your expedition crew into the deep jungle. Find lost treasure, explore the ancient mysteries that surround the tribe and build your own harem in The Lust City!

name: Yay! Spring Trip with My Coworkers!
description: Yay! Spring Trip with My Coworkers! is a Visual Novel created for Blossom VN Jam 2024 and Fuck Capitalism Jam 2024 as it's about a trip full of fun spring activities and complaining about your job.

name: Long Since The Eschaton
description:
It’s been five years since the apocalypse started, the zombies are slowly decomposing, even new zombies don’t last due to the lack of food source. The last two humans on earth find themselves stumbling upon each other. While one struggles to keep herself alive, the other just wants to end it all.

Long Since the Eschaton follows Kirana, a medic who switched between one survivor group to another until she’s all that’s left. She met Gabe, a self-sustaining survivor who stayed at the same town since the beginning of the plague. Slowly but surely, the two bond and perhaps help each other cope.

name: Murder Mystery Mayhem AI
description: Find the murderer in this AI-powered 1920s whodunit. Interrogate suspects with rich personalities and piece together clues in procedurally generated cases. Experience infinite replayability as you roleplay a detective in this unique blend of deduction, strategy, and AI-driven storytelling.

name: Project Missionary: The Reckoning of Hizzokahpolis
description: A kinetic visual novel about a CEO's search for justice and an unexpected happening.

name: Bub-O Burst
description: Bub-O Burst your way through addictive, score-chasing fun, with fierce bubble action, in this throwback to classic 2D action arcade games! It's easy to learn, but do you have the skills to master it?

name: Milcham: From the Ashes of Hearts
description: A girl of low social class goes undercover to infiltrate a prestigious high school, tasked with a perilous mission.

name: Wordpieces
description: Wordpieces is a word connect puzzle game where you have to connect the word pieces in the right order to reveal the hidden inspirational quote.

name: Lost In Static
description: A psychological first person horror game. Your daughter has gone missing. You must find her.

name: Severed
description: Sin descripción

name: Alien: Isolation 2
description:
The announcement was made on Monday 7 October 2024 to coincide with the 10th anniversary of the original game’s release.

“On the 10th anniversary, it seems only fitting to let you know that we have heard your distress calls loud and clear,” said Al Hope, creative director at developer Creative Assembly.

name: Labyrinth of Touhou Tri: The Dreaming Girls & The Mysterious Orbs
description:
A Fanmade Touhou Project DRPG With Not-So-Easy Boss Fights!
The girls of Gensokyo weave together a dungeon RPG with an estimated playtime of 30~50 hours. Pick a frontline of 4 and a rear of 8 to form a party of 12 characters out of a pool over 40+ and conquer extensive dungeons!

The girls of Gensokyo weave together a DRPG with not-so-easy boss fights! Form a party of 12 allies out of a pool of 40+, and create with 1000+ skills to choose from! Hack, slash, and grow stronger, then make builds (or counter-builds!) to take down powerful bosses awaiting you in the dungeons.

name: Side Alley
description: The city is a labyrinth. You always knew it, you just didn't have time to try different paths. Now, you have no choice. Did your coworker put a curse on you? Find out in this bleak horror visual novel featuring point-and-click gameplay elements.

name: Turmoil: Deeper Underground
description: Sin descripción

name: I Became a Dog 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Pathologic 3
description: Save a town from a mysterious plague in this in narrative first-person RPG. Learn the stories of its unusual inhabitants. Shape their lives with your decrees. Diagnose patients. Face the Plague. Connect the dots. Find out who killed the immortal man. Correct your mistakes in the past.

name: Play of Wire
description: Within the brain of "Funblood", you are a "Funblood" who has become severed. So of course, you have to get up now!

name: Twin-Stick Survivors
description: In this Tower Defense Survivor Game, the skill tree is on the ground of the battle map. Expand your base to capture more of the map and unlock more upgrades. Defend your position against thousands of enemies as they flow over the map.

name: Luigi's Requiem
description: Luigi Is Lost in this haunting Nightmare! Can you escape or will you be lost in your mind forever!!!

name: Cheese: The Cheese Collector
description: Cheese - The Cheese Collector is a grindy clicker game. Compete against friends or the globe to have the most cheese. Unlock upgrades, choose a theme that fits you, View a user's profile and statistics.

name: Magician
description: Magician is an episodically released psychological horror visual novel. Currently, only the first day is out.

name: Rise of a Legend
description: Rise of a Legend is a third-person action RPG that immerses you in the ruthless era of gladiatorial combat. Engage in rich single-player progression or take on challengers in online multiplayer matches. Manage your Ludus, level up your fighters, and boost your house's prestige with every victory.

name: Top Classic Plaigarized
description: Welcome to Top Classic Plaigarized (the misspelling is intentional). This game was heavily influenced by "Top Neon Rush". Avoid obstacles and shrink when you need to (some obstacles can only be avoided by shrinking).

name: Bakudan Baku-tan
description: A simple caravan shooter with tiny creatures. A game focused on scoring points while dodging the hell of bullets and defeating enemies.

name: MyTeardrop
description: Take care of your awesome little Teardrop. You could also just feed her lemons for her entire life! All that matters is that you're now Teardrop's best friend.

name: Upper Gumtree
description: Nothing ever happens in Upper Gumtree - not until Professor Blowitovitz moved into town...

name: Braaains
description: Braaains is an exciting, deep, action-packed game for Facebook users. Players are able to build a team of amazing Zombies, amassing a horde and battling their friends. Players can watch the combat happen right before their eyes, leveling up their player and buying new weapons, enhancements, and abilities. There is no stop to the fun players can have customizing and creating a unique and powerful horde of Zombies.

name: Galacard Platinum
description: Welcome to the Platinum edition of the Planetary Galacard Tournament! In this competition, you’ll be able to play against Galacard aficionados from every corner of Planet Ack, and, above all, have fun!

name: Arktwend: The Forgotten Realm
description:
Arktwend is a total conversion to The Elder Scrolls 3: Morrowind.

The player begins his adventure in a monastery where he grew up, outside the monastery the whole wide world awaits him. But strange things have happened in Arktwend, shadows roam the land and long-forgotten, old forces are pushing back the power. The age of heroes has begun!

name: Double-Dabble
description: You get 5 tries to guess the secret word. The 26 letters of the English alphabet are randomly paired, and you can only guess pairs of letters. Letters in your guess are: green if either bound letter is in the right place; yellow if either bound letter is in the word somewhere else; or grey if neither bound letter is in the word.

name: Formula Karts
description: Formula Karts is a semi-realistic racing title that attempts to capture the spirit of kart racing with it's low slung feeling of speed, and corner after corner of impressive handling (and inevitable sliding). The title supports both simulation and arcade modes, and features some effective race AI for non-player vehicles. Two player split screen is supported albeit with some slowdown.

name: Crown of Ashes and Flames
description:
Crown of Ashes and Flames is a fantasy interactive fiction game, free to play on pc and mobile! You play as the only remaining member of the royal family of Vesphire; living in the home of the man that took away everything from you.

It is currently in development and each chapter will be released as they are finished.

name: Tlatoani
description: Discover the wonders of the Aztec Civilization as you build your own magnificent metropolis in this ancient city builder adorned with beautiful hand drawn 2D graphics. From humble beginnings rise to build, trade and conquer to become Tlatoani (Emperor).

name: Madtoys Knights
description: Imagine a game where your childhood toys transform into mighty warriors, ready to defend their castle or conquer new realms. In Madtoys Knights, 32 players clash in intense battles where teamwork and cunning tactics are keys to victory.

name: Destiny 2: Revenant - Act 1
description: Fikrul the Fanatic has re-emerged, possessing a powerful Echo and an army of undead Scorn at his command. Guardians will become Slayer Barons and upgrade their abilities with powerful tonics to confront the Scorn’s corrupted ether.

name: Parasitic Descent
description: In a world ravaged by a catastrophic event, humanity teeters on the brink of extinction. In "Parasitic Descent," you step into the boots of a lone survivor navigating the haunting remnants of a once-thriving civilization.

name: Wolfram
description: Wolfram is a modern remake of Wolfenstein 3D, game created by id Software in 1992. It is designed mainly for those fans who wants to play old good game, but who is tired of pixelated sprite graphics. Well, many people could say that it is nonsense, retro games are distinctive and original and do not need any graphic enchancements. This is the point, but we, the authors, think in a different way. We hope that the remake will find it's niche and some of you guys will like it.

name: Poly Fire
description: Poly Fire is a tactical multiplayer team 1st person shooter. Using a variety of weapons and characters, you will battle with up to 32 players on Various maps . By managing your skills correctly, you will lead your team to victory.

name: Prairie Dog Hunt
description: Sin descripción

name: Remington Upland Game Hunter
description: Sin descripción

name: Gun Runner
description: Sin descripción

name: 10-Day Champion
description: With only 10 days to prepare, every decision counts as you mold your chosen champion into a formidable competitor. Engage in turn-based battles against beasts or other combatants.

name: Diction
description:
Diction is a word based puzzle game, where you have to make as many unique words as possible.
You're given a starting word, and your goal is to turn it into a different word by adding, changing or removing only a single letter at a time. Then keep it up by changing your new word into a different one.

name: Super Conductor
description: Redirect the train to collect 100 coins across 30+ levels, which range from straightforward tracks to spaghetti-like tangles

name: Labyrinth
description: Design your character and embark on a perilous quest filled with mystery, danger, and untold treasures. Explore winding corridors, engage in strategic turn-based battles, and plunder loot from the labyrinthine depths.

name: Castaway Samurai
description: Inspired by the real story of Manjirō Nakahama, live the experience of a lone samurai survivor struggling for their life using everything at their disposal.

name: Off-Planet Dreams
description: is an invisible puzzle platformer where dying is feedback, death is information. As you move about each level, your mind will fill in the blanks and any deaths are simply an instant restart showing you where

name: Roped In: Deuces Wild
description: Sin descripción

name: Minimal Arcade
description: three very small games for playdate

name: Paper Puzzle
description: Place all the pieces into the grid, and as long as they don't overlap, you can clear the level. Simple rules but a real challenge. Want to give it a try?

name: Jugglenoid
description: Welcome to the circus. Exciting adventures await you with funny clowns. The clowns came up with a special juggling machine and called it Jugglenoid.

name: Throne Wars
description: A turn-based strategy game that challenges you to command your forces across 30 meticulously designed levels. Recruit your army, master the battlefield, and outmaneuver your opponents in both single-player and multiplayer modes.

name: Konfronto
description: Sci-fi roguelike auto battler where you command an intergalactic carrier, outfitting it with new spacecraft and technologies to take on other players in asynchronous multiplayer

name: Portrait of a Cornish Woman
description: Portrait of a Cornish Woman is a Victorian Romance Visual Novel of Manners, capturing the subtle, yet powerful emotions of two women as they fight for their place in each other's lives while living under a veil of discretion.

name: Their Navy Is Their Doom
description: Command an advanced submarine in a heart-pounding horror experience as you hunt the last remnants of a defeated enemy beneath the Mariana Trench. Navigate, survive, and uncover terrifying oceanic secrets in this immersive underwater warfare game.

name: Origami Angel: Feeling Not Found
description: The Nintendo DS release of Feeling Not Found, the third full-length record from the American pop punk duo Origami Angel.

name: Raiden Nova
description:
Raiden unites! Get ready to blast into a thrilling new dimension like never before!
