The legendary vertical-scrolling shooter Raiden is reborn as a thrilling twin-stick 2D shooter! Freely aim and shoot with dual sticks, dodging bullets from every direction.

Level up to unlock a variety of weapons and enhancements, and upgrade your ship to fight your way through epic battles.

name: Shuntle
description:
You get 6 tries to guess the secret word. The secret word is between 4 and 7 letters and you can guess words between 4 and 7 letters. Shorter secret words may have trailing spaces or leading spaces. Spaces might be at the beginning, the end, or both.

Letters in your guess are: green if you guessed a letter in the right place; yellow if the letter is somewhere else in the word; or grey if the letter is not in the word.

name: Disorderly
description:
Disorderly is a daily trivia game where you try to put a group of items in the correct order, based on some criteria, in as few guesses as possible. In addition to the daily games, there are occasionally extra games that are either too difficult or niche to use as the daily game.

New games go live at (or sometimes shortly after) 12:00 AM Eastern Time.

name: Anomaly Corridor
description: Anomaly Corridor is a horror-themed walking simulator where the player memorizes a corridor in a spaceship during Section 0 and proceeds through the airlocks into new sections leading to an escape pod. Creatures and other weird phenomena haunt the hallway with anomalies that you must look for with the help of your flashlight to discover any anomalies that have changed the corridor. If an anomaly has been spotted, you must return to the airlock you came from to progress to the next section. Successfully make it to section 10 to board the last escape pod to survive.

name: Valheim: The Bog Witch
description: Sin descripción

name: Nitro Gen Omega
description: A Spaghetti Anime turn-based tactical RPG where you lead a crew of mercenaries through wastelands overrun by ruthless machines. Engage in high-octane cinematic Mech battles, recruit pilots and grow relationships. Play solo or join an online world where every character is procedurally generated.

name: Songs of Conquest: Vanir
description: Songs of Conquest's first new faction has arrived from the shores of the Bleak East. Conquer the lands of Aerbor as the mighty raiders of Vanir and witness their powerful transformation into the Vildra.

name: Scramble Heart City
description: From the team behind Tough Love Arena comes Scramble Heart City, an exciting, 3v3 tag team fighting game that's playable in browser — no installation required!

name: Train Sim World 5: Deluxe Edition
description: The Rails are Yours in Train Sim World 5: Deluxe Edition! Take on more challenges as you master more trains and iconic cities across 4 routes, additionally including the Avanti Class 390 Pendolino, FlixTrain Vectron and Cajon Pass.

name: Spell Tonaeru
description:
Keyboard barrage roguelike!

A game where you physically move around the on-screen keyboard and keep casting magic spells.

name: Gertie Goose
description:
You are in control of GERTIE GOOSE.

• FOREST DEMONS have stolen your 8 eggs.

• Search the hidden forest locations for your lost eggs.

• Beat the MASTER DEMON by collecting most of your lost eggs.

name: Gengu Survival
description: Survive on an open-world island with unlockable abilities that help you on your journey in Gengu Survival. Craft new items as you level up and build your own base wherever you want. But be aware, there is something strange on this island...

name: Project Viper
description: Sin descripción

name: Halo Infinite: Operation Haloween
description:
It’s that time of year again where there’s a chill in the air, the wind howls and bites as the night comes early, a thin mist settles over the fields, and humanity marches on—their minds and bodies fueled by pumpkin spice lattes... With this change of the seasons, it is also time for a new Halo Infinite Operation. Welcome to Haloween!

Get yourselves in the Haloween mindset with the Survive the Undead playlist. Grab your friends, gear up, and jump into a unique twist on Halo Infinite’s Firefight experience as you stand your ground against endless waves of enemies that have been banished from their graves.

Celebrate Haloween with a free new Operation Pass, consisting of 20 tiers and featuring the Spartanstein armor set. This free cosmetic Halloween-themed "operation pass" launched aside this update and ran from October 8, 2024 to November 5, 2024. It was made available in perpetuity to those who purchased the pass.

name: SpikeOut: Final Edition
description: Spikeout: Final Edition is the 1999 update for Spikeout: Digital Battle Online, and the second in the Spikeout series of arcade games. It replaces the game's attract sequence, balances out the characters, adds 2 new stages and bonus stages, and adds a cutscene explaining the backstory of the game's villain Mikhael.

name: Escape from Sharptooth Valley
description:
Escape from Sharptooth Valley is a single-player narrative game to walk, explore, fight, or befriend!

Choose your own story and discover the origins of the Gen-like life in the World of Nefthar.

name: Iris to Id: Ghosts in the Machine
description: A tale about four unexpected friends experiencing sinister events related to the sins of their past

name: Bender 2: Bend Harder
description:
Step into the circuits of a robot with an unusual job: bending bars to precise angles.

Your hydraulic hands are itching to twist metal as you stand at the first workstation. A single button controls the bending, and thicker bars bend slower than thinner bars. Let go of the controls when the bar reaches the target angle. Success/retry/fail?

name: Free the Bird
description: Released in August 2006 as an entry for the first JayIsGames game design competition

name: Investment Run
description: Start from rags and get to the moon by making the right investments! Walk your way to the finish line by collecting money and avoiding obstacles! Beware of the gold diggers, they try to take all your money away from you! Will you reach your private helicopter and create your own empire on it? Will you become the new Jeff Bezos / Warren Buffet / Elon Musk? Simple and intuitive game for everybody to become rich and stay away from poverty! Controls are easy, you will love it!

name: Persona 4 Dancing All Night: Heaven featuring Hatsune Miku
description: DLC for Persona 4 Dancing All Night which allows the player to play a special versione of Heaven with Hatsune Miku as a dancer.

name: Gabibbo Massacre
description: Indie horror game made as a parody of the popular italian mascotte "Gabibbo".

name: Grimwild Horror
description: A newspaper article from 1994, titled "MASS MURDER AT GRIMWILD", put everyone into trauma as all the residents of Grimwild were found dead, their bodies dismembered. After this incident, the city was cut off and everyone was prohibited from entering it. What might have happened?

name: Sex Twice Hentai
description: A puzzle game for Java.

name: Mafia Wars: Yakuza
description: The award-winning Mafia Wars franchise explodes in Japan with an all-out war to control Tokyo! Outcast from society, the Yakuza must survive like no other underground organization.

name: Sapphire City Part 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Rouvy
description: ROUVY is an indoor cycling app built around scenic routes from around the world and realistic riding physics.

name: Horror Prison
description: Uncover the secrets hidden in the shadows, confront the monstrous results of these experiments, and escape with your sanity intact.

name: Sym-Bionic Titan: Teenage Warriors
description: A 2D platformer browser game based on the cartoon series Sym-bionic Titan. You can choose between two characters: Lance or Ilana, to defeat enemies and progess through the levels.

name: Towne of Gringle
description: Towne of Gringle is a comedy strategy game where you have been accused of murder, so you must manipulate a medieval town into declaring you innocent.

name: The Last of the 9 Lives
description: In this fast-paced, infinite jumping adventure, guide your cat as they leap from platform to platform, racing against the rising water that speeds up the longer you survive. Precision and quick reflexes are key as you collect milk and fish for bonus points, all while navigating randomly generated platforms. With its charming pixel art and simple controls, the game offers a challenging yet rewarding experience where every jump counts. A throwback to simpler times. How high can you climb before the water catches up?

name: You Are the Inch Valley Captive
description: "You Are the Inch Valley Captive" is a single-player Quake map, designed as an adventure where the player will tumble through the dangers of multiple dungeons in a non-linear quest to escape the Inch Valley.

name: Ukosz
description: Survive in a post-soviet style brutalist city...

name: Realm of Dissonance
description: A seven level episode for Quake, using the original texture set from the base game. Includes a secret level, and has support for Deathmatch and Co-Op, (although NOT fully tested, as it was designed primarily with SP in mind).

name: Cursed Hours
description: Cursed Hours is a psychological horror game. You play as a thief breaking into an old mansion, hoping for treasure. Soon, you realize something is wrong. Doors slam, eerie noises fill the air, and you're locked inside. A dark presence is watching you. Escape may be impossible.

name: Små Ord
description: Finn dyret som elgen tenker på i flotte naturomgivelser. Gjett deg frem ved hjelp av bokstavene og se om du klarer utfordringen!

name: Pizza Delivery in a Storm
description: A motorbike action game where you deliver pizzas in a storm

name: A Dark Forest
description: An incremental experimental idle/clicker horror game.

name: Beyond Astra
description: Beyond Astra is a real-time 4X sci-fi grand strategy game. Expand your own civilization, explore captivating and mysterious planets and star clusters, interact with your citizens and other life forms and shape your destiny through nearly infinite possibilities.

name: Monster Elevator
description: As a federally mandated minimum wage servant for the esteemed Monster Tower Resort and Spa, your goal is to go floor to floor constructing

name: Poco's Maze Adventure
description: Poco wants to go out and play, but the world just keeps getting in her way! Help Poco navigate the mazes while keeping an eye out for tasty fish snacks.

name: Word Rocket
description: Welcome to the Interplanetary Defense Agency, cadet!

name: Electrolight
description: Electrolight is a tiny game about a tiny piece of light on a tiny adventure. The goal— explore the world outside the cozy home you wake up in everyday—the computer.

name: MysteryScrolls
description: Are you ready to become a medieval cryptex scroll master?

name: Frizzle
description: Unravel the dark secret within Frizzle, a small but captivating virtual pet game for the Panic Playdate. While the pixelated world promises warmth and companionship, an unsettling undercurrent simmers beneath the surface. As you nurture your digital friend, a struggle for dominance unfolds, forcing you to question everything you thought you knew.

name: Fortress
description: Fortress is an exploration game with different enemy and weapon types, puzzles, secrets, unique dialogue, and more. There are 57 different rooms in the game for you to explore. Your character starts with no weapons or items and you progress through the game by finding items, solving puzzles, and interacting with NPCs. The game uses the D-pad the vast majority of the time as you navigate a large fortress filled with monsters, people, stories, and traps. The game utilizes the crank for one of the puzzles. You receive scores at the end of the game based on how many treasures you collect, how many gems you find, and how many times you die in the game. The main objective of the game is to escape the fortress! There is no save functionality, but you can lock your Playdate and start where you left off later on. An average playthrough takes about 30 minutes. It takes most players more than one playthrough to achieve the top rank in each category.

name: Echo: The Oracle's Scroll
description: Explore a fading world and best its many challenges. As an adventurous child, you'll embark on a quest to deliver a scroll from Bottomrock up to The Archives. Journey through magma lakes and overgrown caverns as you venture through The Kingdoms Three!

name: EA Sports WRC 24
description: Elevate your rally experience with the WRC 2024 Season Expansion Bundle! Discover thrilling new locations, Tet Rally Latvia and the Orlen 80th Rally Poland. Drive the latest high-performance vehicles including the Ford Fiesta Rally3 Evo and Toyota GR Yaris Rally1 HYBRID '24. Customize your rally cars with more than 50 new liveries and compete against 52 official crews. Brace yourself to embark on your continued rally journey.

name: Grim Omens
description:
Set in a realm of eternal night, Grim Omens puts the player in the shoes of a fledgling vampire, a creature of blood and darkness struggling to maintain the grip on their fading humanity in a mysterious and hostile world.

The game combines classic dungeon crawling elements, familiar turn-based combat mechanics, and various tabletop and boardgame influences to create an immersive and accessible old-school RPG experience.

name: Cat Guardian
description: Cat Guardian is a flexible card game blending tower defense and survival. Manage resources, build, and strategize to protect the Tree of Hope from zombies. Can the cats of Meowx Planet succeed in their mission and survive?

name: Jak & Daxter: The Lost Levels
description: The Lost Levels of Jak and Daxter was a java-based web browser game. The legend was that it was the original vision of the Jak and Daxter series, or at least The Precursor Legacy, developed by Gil Acheron in the 1990s and was previously unpublished.

name: Legion
description: Legion is a side-scrolling shoot 'em upset in a futuristic world. Players control a fighter pilot tasked with defending a futuristic empire from waves of mechanical enemies.

name: Pilot Light
description: Navigate through pitch-dark caverns with only the light of the rocket engine as you journey to the center of the universe.

name: Kitchen Wars
description: Kitchen Wars is a fast-paced party game with 2-8 players that plunge players into the chaos of a restaurant, where they must engage in strategic fights and theft while catering to their clients.

name: Splintered
description: A unique RPG where the villain randomizes the world with each defeat. Start with a classic RPG experience, then delve into shifting worlds where the overworld, items, and enemies shuffle, creating new challenges. Conquer these worlds to unravel the story and make your way to the final showdown!

name: Widget Inc.
description: A hybrid factory builder / incremental clicker game. Starting from humble beginnings, master the many crafting processes to build up resources and expand your factory. Then, using your newly automated production, unlock new technology and grow ever closer to your goal of spreading to the stars.

name: Toushin Gent
description: Seeking the coveted Goon Crystal and Bloodline Emblem, the Brutal Cook Gent must face Bendy Town and its strange dungeon. Guide our reluctant "hero" as he faces unwanted attention from friends and foe alike in this "unique" experience of a game.

name: City of Stolen Worlds
description: A mysterious creature has torn your home from reality. Explore the City of Stolen Worlds, uncover the secrets of its inhabitants, and try to find your way back. Or perhaps you want to become the new Master?

name: Luna's Twilight
description: Luna's Twilight is a fantasy romance visual novel that brings together classic fantasy elements with heart-fluttering romance. In a secluded mansion hidden deep within a a silent forest, four men from different races whisper words of love to you. Who will be the one to win your heart?

name: Cosmic Call
description: Cosmic Call is a brutal 3D FPS Roguelike Boomer shooter set inside the prison of the Great One. Fight your way out of this hellish nightmare, collecting otherworldly weapons and horrifying items along the way.

name: Dungeon Watchers
description: Survive and destroy monsters to your heart's content with the help of powerful and unique characters. Unlock new characters and discover the synergies with their abilities to unleash game-breaking builds and slay everything on your path.

name: Well to Hell
description: A short first-person horror game where you play as an urban explorer trapped at the bottom of a well. Find a way out before it finds you.

name: Isoland: Pumpkin Town
description: ISOLAND Pumpkin Town? What the hell kind of game is this and what does it have to do with ISOLAND, Mr Pumpkin.

name: Metamorphosis
description: Sin descripción

name: Teeny Tiny Harbors
description: Sin descripción

name: Cinematrix
description: For each square, select a movie that satisfies the two intersecting clues from the x-axis and y-axis. You have nine guesses to fill out the entire grid. A given movie cannot be used twice.

name: Wilt
description: You're a little slime and there's one thing you love more than anything else: rubies! But it's not good for your health: you're wilting fast from eating them! This is a 30 stage platformer where you need to plan how you pick up collectibles to win.

name: Droian
description: Meet I.A.N, the Interplanetary Android Navigator, and humanity's last hope. With a heart of steel and unwavering determination, I.A.N is on a mission to navigate the treacherous depths of an distant isolated moon. Armed with advanced technology and a noble purpose, this extraordinary android will guide you through the haunting realms of DROIAN, all while reminding us that the fight to save humanity is a journey we all share.

name: Lurks Within Walls
description:
Lurks Within Walls is a tense survival horror game combining modern dungeon RPGs' exploration elements with fast-paced turn-based combat. Explore a series of cursed environments filled with terrifying creatures illustrated by the renowned artist Trevor Henderson.

A building under quarantine. Residents isolated. Those who failed to isolate themselves now stagger through the corridors, contaminated. But it's not just the infected residents—the darkness conceals other anomalies. It feels as if the building itself is alive.

name: Movie Grid
description: Select a movie for each cell using the clues that correspond to that cell's rows and columns. Each game, you have nine movie guesses to fill out the grid. A movie cannot be used twice.

name: Zen Rage
description: Zen Rage is a virtual stress ball game that allows players to vent frustration by digitally destroying their desktop or preset backgrounds with a variety of tools. Drawing inspiration from the 90s classic Desktop Destroyer, the game offers a fresh take on chaotic, cathartic destruction. Players can use tools like chainsaws, hammers, machine guns, Tesla-coil rifles, and more to wreak havoc. In addition to freeform destruction, Zen Rage includes a campaign mode where a scientist guides players through a series of tasks and mini-games, culminating in a humorous and unexpected twist.

name: Box Office Game
description: Spend up to ten guesses to reveal the top five movies in the US domestic box office for the given weekend. Players can use points to reveal selected hints about each movie.

name: Alex's Journey to the Grave
description: Alex's Journey to the Grave is a visual novel about a boy trapped by fate and a girl in dire need of a friend. Help guide them through some of the hardest decisions of their lives as they experience warmth, connection, tragedy, the inevitability of death... and the antics of a mysterious black cat.

name: Street Fighter V: Juri Han
description: Sin descripción

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Secrets of the Spire
description: Engage in epic aerial combat on your banshee to uncover the secrets of this new canyon region and restore the peace before it’s too late! Coming Fall 2024.

name: The Shattered Knight of Elaria
description: A game where you play as a trapped soul of a knight in a castle who meets another soul of an alchemist trapped in a lantern. You set out to make amends with your brother, who you regret causing a disaster that ends up trapping the souls within the castle.

name: Horror Office
description: Sin descripción

name: Green Day: Dookie - Welcome to Paradise
description: A fully playable, demastered version of “Welcome To Paradise” on Game Boy made in collaboration with the band Green Day and the Californian art studio BRAIN, which will immerse you in the world of a small apartment in Oakland, California. Search out the record to play the full 8-bit rendition of your favorite song. Listen till your thumbs are sore then play again.

name: Another Way of Gettin' Paid
description: Juggling being a sugar baby and sugar daddy at the same time... and it only gets more complex from there!

name: Another Way of Gettin' Paid
description: As Shunji's various acquaintances begin to interact in ways they were never supposed to, he finds his social circle expanding farther than he could have ever imagined...

name: Countdown
description: Countdown is a short visual novel that tells the story of an ordinary individual's journey through their thoughts and emotions as their life approaches its end. The plot includes critiques and discussions of social issues such as life, family, the workplace, and the healthcare system.

name: Frog Box
description: In "Frog Box," help a frog push boxes to form lines of three or more matching ones to clear the board. Explore challenging levels with natural obstacles like logs and streams that affect the movement of the boxes.

name: Sexy Memory Puzzle: Pool Massage
description: Solve the puzzles to reveal and collect pictures of a sexy girl receiving a sexual massage by the pool, hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match. Flip two cards, and if the numbers on them match, they will be removed from the board, revealing a unique image.

name: CrapShoot
description: Kick the crap out of them! Side-scrolling bullet-hell shooter.

name: Missile Survivor
description: Survive a barrage of incoming missiles, defeat ace enemy pilots, and become the air combat ACE!

name: We Happy Restaurant
description:
Welcome to We Happy Restaurant Mega Group Inc.. Here you will have an opportunity to run your own restaurant and be a productive, profitable member of the corporate family.

Our mega group's killer product, green essence, is the foundation of our immensely profitable restaurant business. It keeps our customers hungry and always wanting more! With such an incredible weapon at hand, we can save ourselves from the dull effort of improving the food, and really really focus on the difficult part that is not doing anything! Too good to be true? Join us now, and find out for yourself!

name: Reconquista
description: Reconquista is a large-scale battle strategy game with the rules of a deck-building board game with a mood of late Medieval. Carefully refine your strategy, build the best deck, and to win the battles.

name: Calypso's Calamity
description: Calypso's Calamity is a ruthless magical rogue-lite platformer where you play as a courageous dog on a quest to rescue her princess, battling enemies, gathering randomized items, and unlocking new abilities in beautifully crafted levels.

name: Tile To Tile
description: Tile to Tile is an action platformer where the longer you move the faster you go! Your goal is to get the gem at the end of each level as fast as possible!

name: They Do Not Die
description: I just think that top down shooters are neat. It's a pretty zen time. A podcast game.

name: Sweet Coffee Shop
description: Sweet Coffee Shop - is a simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with relaxing music accompaniment. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girl's photo in the gallery. (Updated AI painting style, more fresh and real)

name: Dreamstate
description: Dreamstate, can you survive your worst nightmare? In a point-and-click sit-and-survival psychological horror game, you fight off your nightmares throughout multiple nights to make it to the end of the week, with each night getting more challenging.

name: Days In Palis
description: Days in Palis is an immersive visual novel set in the fictional metropolis of "Palis." Players will experience passionate love stories and complex relationships centered around three female protagonists. By unlocking the plot, you'll gain a deeper understanding of their inner worlds.

name: HeartWood
description: Play as a young druid set to purify the wilting Ancient tree to save the forest's life force. With your staff in hand, use and gain new magical plants to help fight against the hordes of creatures. Will you restore the Ancient tree's power, or die trying?

name: A Fascinating Story: Ice Cream
description: In the game, you need to find two cards with the same picture and successfully eliminate them. On the contrary, the cards with different faces will not change. The way to pass the level is to eliminate all the cards in the picture. You can experience more character pictures after passing the level~

name: Darkly Glass
description: Trade your soul for digital fame in this psychological visual novel. As fallen tech mogul Doran White, navigate a treacherous social media landscape. Your choices shape his fate in this hand-drawn, neuroscience-inspired reimagining of Oscar Wilde's classic.

name: Byterage
description: Byterage: Epic Battle Against the Quantum Legion Byteplex City is under the occupation of the Quantum Legion. The only hope is Steel X, fighting with his katana. Defeat enemies with fast and fluid combat. Slow down time to dodge bullets and prove your skills in this challenging experience.

name: Mystical Sovereign Z
description: Mystical Sovereign Z is a sci-fi/fantasy hybrid strategy game. Experience real time battles and turn based strategy with various RPG elements and choices to be made along the way.

name: The Moments Before Death
description: (Text Base Adventure Visual Novel) Input via text with VN graphics. Waking up in a mysterious field, you find yourself invited into a quaint house overseen by a gaunt old lady and her children. Yet, an unsettling feeling grows. The house's rules, seemingly straightforward, begin to unravel.

name: Fork-U
description: Fork-U is a physics based forklift simulator. Drive and operate a forklift in 1st or 3rd person. Try your hand at loading and unloading pallets in a warehouse, delivering building materials in a construction site, keeping shelves stocked in a grocery store, and more!

name: The Memory In Walden Pond
description: Imitate ancient Chinese,In the bamboo forest landscape, survival hunting, farming herding horses, fishing qiao Jiang Zhu, build their own peach blossom source.

name: Yet Another Hentai Puzzle: Cyberpunk
description: Yet Another Hentai Puzzle game to keep you happy.

name: Bara Labs
description: Bara Labs is a short collection of experimental prototype games made by our team. We will decide whether or not to make a full-length game out of the shorts based on how the prototypes are received by the players.

name: Casual Sport Series: Hockey
description: Grab a controller, jump on the ice and score goals to prove you're a hockey champion. Play in campaign mode against teams from around the world, alone, or with three additional players in couch mode!

name: Spellagis
description: Spellagis is an arena-shooter and roguelite hybrid. Brave mages unite to prevent darkness and restore balance. By combining knowledge and artifacts, they engage in a battle where every step towards victory is deceptive and dangerous.

name: Hentai Ami
description: Ami is an athletic girl who loves going to the gym, but she didn't know that a pervert who loves BDSM also trains there.

name: Colony: Arena Online
description: Fight against rebel robots together with your friends and save planets from invasion....

name: Meow Hunter
description:
Meow Hunter is a pixel side-scrolling action RPG featuring adorable cat characters. It combines classic roguelike elements with the exhilarating combat experiences of platformer games.

In this meow-velous universe, you'll become a bounty hunter taking on missions across various planets in a space adventure to find energy and resources. Every hunt offers a fresh experience with a touch of retro arcade fun. Ready for it? The battle is set to unfold!

name: Zugnaex
description: Immerse yourself in Zugnaex. Compatible with DOOM and DOOM II, it blends classic FPS action with a modern user interface and a detailed heads-up display. Enjoy single-player campaigns and free* online multiplayer for epic battles. (* - requires DOOM)

name: Cheetahs Are Meant To Be Fast
description: An interactive storybook about how being a fat guy who eats a lot is very morally wrong and not at all awesome or attractive.

name: Craig 12: Craig's Escape
description: Oh no! Craig was taken away! You must help him get to safety, or else...

name: Nettle
description: A survival RTS game about exploring the vast cosmos, the many planets inhabiting it and their countless secrets. You'll need to explore, gather resources and research new technologies in order to survive, thrive, and eventually build a colony on a bizarre, foreign world.

name: Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds Ultimate
description: "Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds Ultimate" is a side-scrolling beat'em up with the heart of a fighting game, supporting cross-platform pixel art anime action with up to 8P online multiplayer and all the characters from "Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds Overdrive"!

name: Hexity
description: Build your city! Start with tents. Expand and improve life in your city. Explore new technologies and discover new buildings.

name: The Path of Veins
description: I have seen the face. Amongst the small white bones wrapped in fabric. Beneath the veins leading to the goddess. Within the black blood of the eucharist.

name: Webfishing
description: Webfishing is a multiplayer chatroom-focused fishing game! Relax and fish (on the web!)

name: Pet Cam
description: Arya living a peaceful life by day, but each night, an eerie phone call from her father haunts her sleep. One night, the call turns into a nightmare, unraveling a terrifying story about her past. Can you uncover the truth before it consumes you?

name: Fantasy War Heroes: Chilling Fog
description: Press one of your houses and drag to other house to move your troops. Conquer all houses for victory. Enemy wants to destroy your troops. Now with movable heroes that appear later in the game when you have learnt basics.

name: Tiny Pods Rescue: 2D Board Game Edition
description: Real time tactical board game, abstract graphics. Send commands to pods. Stack them up, move them around a procedurally generated board map known as a district. You need to re-conquer the districts of Earth and Solar System. Thousands of human and alien pods at your fingertips.

name: Silent Surveillance
description: Silent Surveillance is a horror puzzle game where you monitor multiple security cameras to find anomalies. Stay vigilant—you wouldn't want to succumb to the lurking terror waiting for a single moment of distraction. Can you survive the night?

name: World Rally Arcade
description: BRINGING THE ARCADE BACK TO RALLY

name: Paris Games Fail!
description: Satiric cartoony roguelite deckbuilder inspired by Blackjack rules. Play strategically cards depicting true events of the 2024 olympics. Collect boosters and trigger hilarious combos. Complete challenges while you burn through your deck, keeping your eyes on the prize: achieving world-class failure.

name: Mom
description: Mom says I can't get out of my room after 12:00 AM. But I always hear the door opening and closing after that hour. Why isn't mom sleeping?

name: Save Scream and Run
description: Endless Runner game.A microphone is required for the game.The game is an endless runner in which the player controls a chicken that runs from a fox. The player must jump over obstacles and collect bonuses.

name: ChessRogue
description: A chess themed roguelike featuring online high scores.

name: Pixel Arcade
description: Portal into neon cyberspace in Pixel Arcade. Defy gravity, optimize your strategy, and vault through adrenaline-packed levels. Achieve global dominance in the leaderboard to become a VR champion in the ultimate test of precision and agility.

name: Earth Daddy
description: Are you ready to join the Plan and help shape Earth's future?

name: October Panic
description: An arcade-style platformer with five levels and no saving/loading. A small trick-or-treat bag packed to the brim with both treats and tricks.

name: Little Warriors Team
description: The Little Warriors team includes gameplay such as character development, material collection, equipment synthesis, and challenging bosses. The game allowing players to form battle teams according to their preferences and freely switch between controlled characters during battles.

name: Fishing Grind
description: Fishing Grind is a first person 1-6 player co-op fishing game with a twist. The place you are fishing may not always be safe...

name: Bratty Bottoms!
description: Play as a hardworking newcomer hired to help manage the family-owned motel, run by the bratty yet endearing Lila.

name: Magiscapes
description: Welcome to Magiscapes, the world's first AI sandbox adventure! Build your camp, create AI companions, and form unique bonds through interactions. Embark on a journey of discovery and enjoy the freedom to explore!

name: Into The Matrix
description: "Into The Matrix" is a multiplayer horror game where you and your friends must explore, survive, and outsmart dangers. Beware the Matrix Overseer, who watches and twists reality itself. Many entities are after you, but the Overseer is the true threat. Can you escape its grasp?

name: Broad Daylight
description: The day awaits. Whether it ends with you going to visit family, taking a breath in the park, or hiding inside your apartment, it all can be taken away without you having a say in the matter. Regardless of all the chances that life might provide, one truth persists: carpe diem.

name: Gun Frog
description: Gun Frog is a unique physics-based movement shooter where you bounce on lily pads, kill flies and explore a vibrant world as a frog that ate a gun.

name: Through The Veil
description: A horror game in which the line between madness and reality is blurred.

name: Xeno TD
description: The task is very simple - do not let the enemy forces pass on the way to your base. Enemies move along a marked path while you place defense towers along the path.

name: Arclight City
description: Embark on a thrilling journey through a sprawling metropolis teeming with neon-lit streets, clandestine corporations, and an underworld shrouded in mystery. Arclight City combines the allure of retro text-based graphics with captivating modern pixel art, delivering a truly unique visual experience.

name: Cup Hand and Head Adventures
description: Sin descripción

name: Cup Hand Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Synthwave Escape
description:
Retro Rhythm Puzzle Platformer game with an 80s inspired Synthwave Soundtrack.

Synthwave Escape is a Retro Rhythm Puzzle Platformer game with an 80s inspired Synthwave Soundtrack & Aesthetic.

Join Doc Grits' team of robots as they attempt to escape the Neon Bunker and defeat the heinously infamous Red Hawk. Use the Escape Bots' skills together to overcome challenges and make it safely to safety!

name: Tiny Cafe
description:
Run your own cafe for free!
Open and run a cafe with Dolce, the world's smallest barista mouse, and the cat Gusto.
Brew drip coffee with beans from Gusto's own roastery.
The aromatic smell of coffee will attract cats to your cafe.

name: Video Game Store: Supermarket Simulator
description: Video Game Store: Stock, Shop, Succeed!

name: Submarine Bubble
description: What would you do if you were a bubble and had to gather as many stars as possible? But in this adventure, it won’t be that simple.

name: Summer Tri-Peaks Solitaire
description: Amazing Tri-Peaks Solitaire fun for whole family!

name: The Genie of the Wonderful Lamp
description: The story focuses on the further adventures of Aladdin, the young adventurer from Agrabah, after his first encounter with the magic lamp.

name: Theme Park Jam
description: Match 3 and ride the roller coaster

name: The Super Bunnies: Scarlet Wonder Ninjas
description: In this visual novel, a group of brave ninja rabbits embark on an exciting mission to protect their peaceful village.

name: The Treasure of Neverland
description: In this visual novel set in the magical world of Neverland, Peter Pan and the Lost Boys embark on a quest to discover a treasure hidden deep within the island.

name: Hide 'N Seek!
description: ...8, 9, 10. Ready or not, here I come!

name: Gym Business: Fitness Empire Simulator
description: Build Your Fitness Empire – Embark on Your Dream Gym Journey!

name: AI Doctor
description:
Destroy all the viruses that make patients sick!
Play easily and simply with one hand anytime, anywhere!
Brilliant attack effects of various roguelike skill combinations are basic!
A cool action and a sense of impact that will blow away all the stress you don't have!
Upgrade Baruda to become the world's strongest physician by equipping and combining various equipment!

name: Perfect Klondike Solitaire
description: Prepare to test your strategic solitaire abilities!

name: Pharaoh's Riches
description:
Toss coins and explore the mysteries of Ancient Egypt!
The pharaoh's golden riches await you!

name: Princess Jigsaw Bundle
description: Jigsaws filled with wonder and magic. They include princesses and puppies

name: Marble Flow
description: Solve the puzzle and make the marbles flow

name: Live Action-Bit Theater "Route Yonroku"
description: Suzunone Miu and Rinto will perform a live show in "Live Action-BIT THEATER"!Topping off the live show with energetic voices and sounds!

name: Let's Sing 2025 with UK Hits
description: Standard Edition: The Let’s Sing 2025 Standard edition includes 35 songs and a one month free trial of VIP Pass.

name: Coloring Book: Mandalas
description: Discover the fascinating world of colouring mandalas for adults and children. Escape from stress with amazing designs and a wide range of colours, creating your own artistic creations.

name: Contra x Castlevania Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Football League Cup: Arcade Soccer Simulator
description: Exciting football simulator - take on the role of a coach, assemble your own football team and fight your way to the top of the tournament table!

name: Formula Racing: Grand Prix League
description: Every turn defines a champion!

name: Fruit Party: Suika Casual Puzzle
description: A fun and challenging match puzzle game where you have to match colorful fruits to make them bigger!

name: Eggconsole Templo Del Sol: Asteka II PC-8801
description: Embark on an adventure set in the ancient ruins of Chichen Itza, where you'll explore the Temple of the Sun and search for the Solar Key.

name: TimeFish
description:
Time Running game Freesh wants to escape from the time monster
Freesh wants to escape from the Time-monster
Timon and Timon wants to eat this adorable Time-fish so desperately!
Freesh always tries to swim away to avoid being colored by Timon, but he gets caught at the end everytime.

name: Dungeons 4: Nintendo Switch Edition
description:
Follow the Evil Way and foster the return of the Absolute Evil!
Having to deal with a newborn, dwarves, and her obnoxious stepbrother, wasn’t quite what Thalya had hoped for.

name: Dagon: Complete Edition
description: Immerse yourself in the twisted world of H.P. Lovecraft and unearth the horrors that lie within.

name: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
description: In this new adventure, Alice returns to Wonderland only to discover that time is out of control. Clocks stop, and the entire kingdom seems to be plunged into temporal chaos.

name: Andromeda Survivors
description: Master the Universe and Defeat the Invasion!

name: Bambi: A Life in the Woods
description: This visual novel follows Bambi, now an adult and respected leader in the forest, alongside his longtime friends and new children, Geno and Gurr.

name: Beach Boys: Tarot Hot Cards
description: Discover the power of tarot and win the boy of your dreams. Let the cards reveal the secrets to capturing his heart. Make love work in your favor!

name: Beauty and the Beast: The New Adventure
description: After breaking the first curse that transformed the Prince into a Beast, the tranquility is interrupted when a magical force stops time.

name: Castlevania Collections Bundle
description: [Title lineup] ・Castlevania Dominus Collection ・Castlevania Advance Collection ・Castlevania Anniversary Collection ■Castlevania Dominus Collection In addition to the three action adventure games from the Castlevania series, Haunted Castle R

name: Animal Kung Fu
description: Lin, a young and clumsy red panda with big dreams of being a guardian, embarks on a dangerous mission to save his valley.

name: Stick Combat: Fighting Platformer
description: Defeat Enemies and Overcome Obstacles—Master the Platform with Precision and Parkour!

name: Star Wars: Bounty Hunter & Republic Commando Bundle
description: The Star Wars: Bounty Hunter & Republic Commando Bundle gives you two action-packed Star Wars games for one price! The Bundle Includes: STAR WARS: Bounty Hunter Bring in your bounty, dead or alive.

name: Spy Guy: Detective Games Bundle (3 in 1)
description: Three games of hidden objects = three times more fun!

name: Shanghai Mahjong Solitaire Deluxe
description: Embark on a Zen Puzzle Adventure – Over 900 Levels of Mindful Strategy and Endless Fun!

name: Bundle: Memory - The Original Matching Game from Ravensburger + Rush Hour Deluxe: The Ultimate Traffic Jam Game!
description:
memory: The game that unites and delights generations!
Rush Hour Deluxe: The ingenious logic game.

name: Urban Heat
description: Crew up and conquer the war for power on the streets in Urban Heat! Immerse yourself in the gritty, action-packed urban warzone of this epic multiplayer first-person shooter (FPS) game!

name: Flash McCoy
description: Sin descripción

name: ExpandoScape
description: Manipulate the size of the green gear blocks in order to make your way to seemingly unreachable goals in this unique puzzle-platformer.

name: Bones in the Boneyard
description: There are many bones in the boneyard. As they fall from the screen, arrange skulls in lines of three to clear them and line up complete skeletons to set them free.

name: Two Little Ghosts of that House: The Missing Toy
description: Sin descripción

name: Mazer Laser
description: Dodge, teleport, and advance. Challenge yourself by moving at the speed of light through all kinds of mazes in this Arcade game, where precision and speed will be your best allies.

name: Cats & Dice
description: A roguelike dice-building game where the goal is to overcome an ever-increasing target score each round. Assemble a synergistic set of Cats and dice, go for crazy combos and try to attain as high a score as you possibly can. Master the synergy between cats and dice to win!

name: Refuted Wind
description: This is an atmospheric adventure that will immerse you in a mysterious story. During the game, you will visit many unique places, each of which evokes a feeling of fear and anxiety.
